King Toadstool and the royal governors were holding an annual meeting to determine the kingdom's overall state of affairs and create a plan of what to do in the coming year. It was an incredibly boring meeting with talks of treaties with minor principalities and various lobbyist-equivalents each insisting that their particular area of interest was the most important and thus the most deserving of a larger budget. In spite of this, there was not even anything remotely as interesting as political intrigue -- just a gathering of dried out windbags holding monotonous arguments in drawling monotone.

          The closest thing to political maneuvering to happen at this meeting was when the young Princess Peach Toadstool -- who was yet possessed with traces of that youthful restlessness and implacability, even with her burgeoning wisdom and considerable intellect -- decided that enough was enough and politely asked her father that she be allowed to leave early. King Pomme Toadstool II the Benevolent, having a considerable soft spot for his daughter and only child, acquiesced and permitted her to go, on the condition that she will have to thoroughly review the records of the meeting later.

...

15121121111112.title: Peach wakes up somewhere else

151211211111121.content:
Peach's consciousness stirred as she slowly became aware of her current surroundings. Ancient walls of magical stone surrounded her, covered by lavish tapestries depicting anything from scenes of peace to nightmarish tortures. Peach's gaze flickered downward taking in the sight of her thin body adorned in an elegant dress of several rich purples. Her normal hourglass figure slightly strained the dress and added an additional layer of cushion to the already luxurious black throne she reclined in. Peach's last thought before her consciousness was forced to make room for another presence was that she would have preferred Bowser's dungeon and even the abundant layers and rolls of fat from her dream to her current situation any day.

A voice both silky and seductive as well as dark and terrible broke through her despair to both greet and taunt her.

"Awake again are you my vessel?" The voice of the mighty Shadow Queen condescendingly asked Peach, "Fret not, for you haven't missed anything entertaining. All that has passed was a report on the current strength of our army."

Peach gave a mental sigh of relief, since what Shadow Queen considered entertaining could vary wildly, ranging from paid or threatened performers, to a public execution, carried out personally of course.

"Just a few of the mundane affairs of state remain to be attended to by us, and then the rest of the day can be spent in leisure," Shadow Queen finished.

This actually perked Peach up a bit, as while Shadow Queen did know the intricacies and pitfalls of the paperwork and royal orders that were part of running a modern kingdom, soon to be empire, she preferred to "allow" Peach to complete such tasks, as Peach had far more experience with patience and diplomacy. The Shadow Queen was a much more aggressive woman, as she simply took whatever she desired, through either money or force, force being the preferred choice during her original reign. Any chance for Peach to control her own body was seized jealously, especially paperwork, for this was where Peach could make life just a tiny bit better for the millions who had resided under Shadow Queen's thumb since her catastrophic defeat of Mario and his friends.

With a snap of their fingers, a deep purple table made of shadows rose from the ground in front of the possessed princess. After the table had fully formed, an enchanted pen emerged as well, followed by a stack of documents four inches thick. Peach felt control of her limbs restore to her, and after reading the top document for a few seconds, daintily picked up the pen and began to write. The first sheet was finished quickly, and was followed by a second and a third document in short order as Peach began to enthrall herself in her work, demonstrating the legendary efficiency that had kept the area previously known as the Mushroom Kingdom running smoothly despite a seemingly infinite number of royal kidnappings.

Peach was almost as euphoric as a person in her position could be as her pen flew across the many pages. The only thing that troubled her was the fact that most of the day's paperwork wasn't of the variety that offered a chance for Peach's leniency. Any document she read was also read by Shadow Queen, and any changes that she had to think for more than a split second about would be intercepted and responded to, usually with the mental equivalent of a slap on the wrist. This meant that military orders, supply requisitions from the subjects, and many of Shadow Queen's crueler pieces of legislation were figuratively untouchable. Peach could only change taxation, construction, tribute demands, and other such documents where a five could easily become a two to lighten burdens and workloads. The only other documents she could tamper with were the extremely complex ones that Shadow Queen had never experienced in her old empire, which gave Peach almost free reign as the tyrant possessing her ironically had to simply have faith that Peach wouldn't do anything drastic. As long as the final numbers weren't suspiciously low, Shadow Queen would go as far as to memorize them as the correct baseline for such maze-like paragraphs.

As Peach finally got to a tax decree she could change, a splitting headache preceded a brief flashback to her dream, her vision temporarily being filled by a phantasm of her belly and breasts, and her limbs being encumbered by nearly a hundred pounds of fat. As Peach returned to reality, she hastily erected as many mental shields as she could to hide an epiphany brought on by the flashback. Peach focused on the feelings of helplessness as she had waddled around, and eventually fallen. She realized that if she could impose the same kind of helplessness on at least the form she shared with Shadow Queen, that just maybe, it would aid some intrepid hero in defeating the tyrant.

Peach dropped her mental shields and used the small bit of magic she was allowed to access to signal a servant to bring a full meal to her, including dessert. The second the smoke-like being that delivered a series of plates piled high with food to her faded away, Peach began to consume the meal of heavy meats, juicy fruits, and thick pastries. Unlike in her dream, Peach's eating was as elegant as the rest of her mannerisms, although this was partially to hide her intentions now. The food was quite delicious and well textured, although that was expected as the kitchen staff were eager to avoid Shadow Queen's wrath should the meal be poorly done. The only blemish upon the meal was when Shadow Queen seized control of Peach's body just before she started on a lovely looking double layered cake, and did not return it until the cake was finished. While the act was meant to taunt Peach, it gave her the perfect opportunity to begin increasing her meal sizes.

Peach signaled for another cake to be brought and began to consume the somewhat plainer dessert unimpeded by Shadow Queen, who wasn't in the mood to push Peach to the point where she wouldn't do any more of the paperwork. After the princess finished the extra cake, she began to slowly return to the documents while gently caressing her overtaxed belly. Amidst all this, Peach mused to herself about her new plan. The irony of the somewhat petty and vengeful plan was not lost on her as she thought of how she had not once sought vengeance against another or sought to change her body until under the influence of a being who practically subsisted on vanity and revenge. All of these thoughts were swept away as Peach focused on the likely difficultly of her scheme. Between Shadow Queen's inherently hedonistic nature, and Peach's new determination to finally weaken her in a significant way, her plan might fittingly be a piece of cake.

The evil Koopa King returns and grins evilly. "It's nice to see that you are still standing, or trying to stand!" Bowser and his minions crack into evil laughing at the princess' expense. The princess notices a cart behind him, and probably assumes it's filled with more food for her.

"Minions! Leave us alone, I want to have some fun on my own," Bowser commanded. In seconds, all of the minions in the room disappear like they never existed.

Bowser reached in the food cart and pulled two chocolate cakes, one in each of his hand. "Now princess, we can do this the easy way, where you marry me and never see Mario ever again. Or, the hard way, which involves me stuffing you like a pig. What's it going to be?"

"I'll never marry a slimeball like y-" The princess instantly had a cake shoved into her face.

"That's what I exactly wanted to hear." And with that remark, Bowser begun stuffing the obese princess with cake, after cake, after cake.

After what seemed like the fiftieth cake, Bowser stopped to admire his work.

The nightgown left for the princess was now only covering the princess' yoga sized boobs. Her belly, filled to the brink with numerous amounts of cake doubled in sized, and was now barely touching the ground. The princess' ginormous ass was just as wide as Bowser and stuck out 4 feet behind her. Her massive thunder thighs were constantly rubbing against one another, with no point in sight if them separating. Her arms and legs were now thick as Bowser's and were a massive problem of moving around. Finally, the princess' face was filled with basketball cheeks and had 4 chins underneath. At this point her neck was now non-existent.

With all her strength, she manged to get her 950 lbs on her two feet.

"So, you finally decided to simply use the back door?" Bowser asked. "Well, I hate to waste your time, so I'll show you directly to your princess." Mario could only gape at what had been so thin only a few days ago.

"Mama mia! Your plan was to fatten her up so I could never get her out of here?"

"Correct!" Bowser exclaimed.

"Damnit! That's one good plan!" Mario responded. "Doesn't mean it works, though." Mario pulled out a micro mushroom and chucked it at Bowser's mouth. The Koopa King became smaller than an ant. Mario then took the black mushroom and chucked it into Peach. She shrank and finally became her normal self again.

15121121111121122121.content:
Just when Peach thought it was safe to go back to the kitchen, it struck.

For several days, Peach, along with her friends, had been living her life peacefully in the Mushroom Kingdom. She was once again in her wondrous castle, Mario was still demanding to know when those super elite robotic guards he paid for were coming to the castle (seriously, it's been two months since those were ordered off of "Toad Bros' Online Bazaar"), Toadsworth was once again getting the Princess up to date on what happened while she was kidnapped, and Luigi was still getting mended over that hectic battle he had with Wario (that happened during the fattening, I'm sure you wouldn't want to hear about that). Everything it seemed, had turned back to normal!

And yet, as she strolled into the royal dining hall to eat her two scrambled eggs along with a piece of toast, Peach somehow felt that this was only just the beginning. The slim Princess sat down in her chair and pulled herself closer to the table. As she was about to grab her piece of toast, a loud gurgling noise emerged from her stomach.

"Oh, ohh, what the-" Princess Peach grunted before putting a hand over her skinny belly, "What was that?!"

The grumbling only lasted for a few more seconds before disappearing and the pain had vanished.

"Ok, weird." The Princess said before returning to her more happy state, "Well anyway, this has been quite a pleasant da-AGGH."

Peach suddenly grasped her stomach with both hands and began holding it as if it were a sacred object.

"What is happening to me?!" She moaned, "I feel so hungr...oh nooooo."

As it dawned on Peach what she was feeling, the princess looked at her meal and licked her lips.

"I...I..." Peach muttered as he let go of her stomach and reached for the eggs.

Meanwhile

"Hey, look who's out of the house!" Mario exclaimed gleefully, helping his brother into a chair.

The brothers always preferred to have their weekly breakfast hang out at the "Starbeans Cafe", ever since one was installed in Toad Town. They just really liked the Cafe's coffee, though the fact that they've been getting discounts from the owner didn't hurt either. After a minute of two, Luigi was finally sitting comfortably. True, his left arm and right leg had been in a cast but at least those were the only injuries he had gotten.

"Yeah, I couldn't say no to my Woohoo Blend." The taller Mario brother admitted as he waved to the staff members.

"I already bought one to give you when I was done, Luigi."

"I know, but I just wanted to get out of the house. You wouldn't believe how many times I've been pestered by Daisy."

"I thought she was miles and miles away from here?"

"That didn't stop her from constantly texting my phone every five minutes."

"And where's your phone?" Mario asked with a knowing smirk.

"Oh that, I accidentally left it at my house." Luigi revealed mischievously.

"I sure didn't see that coming." Mario quipped, "So, are any of your broken bones healing yet?"

"Well, it's getting easier to move around. That's gotta mean something good right?"

"I still can't believe Wario was able to pile drive you so expertly." Mario said.

"Oh yes, please remind me of that horrible ass beating I got." Luigi sarcastically requested.

"Ok calm down, I didn't mean anything by it." Mario apologized, "Honestly, I'm just glad you're alright."

"Well thank you." Luigi responded with a small smile.

Soon, the waitress came to their table with two cups filled with hot coffee goodness. As they were put down, Mario had received a call from his phone. Once he dug it out, Mario took a slight sip as he answered the call.

"Hello? Oh hey Peach, how are you doing?" Mario asked before his contorted into worry, "What? No, that can't be. But I gave you the-I know but, ok ok look, I'm gonna be there in five minutes. Don't do anything besides sit in your castle alright? Bye."

Mario then hung up his phone and immediately jumped out of his chair.

"What's with the sudden burst?" Luigi asked, making sure the coffee wasn't spilled.

"Princess Peach is in trouble." Mario said as he grabbed his cup.

"What?! But Bowser never-"

"She's not getting kidnapped, it's a different matter entirely. I'll handle this on my own, you just hang tight and enjoy your coffee bro!" Mario hastily said before he barged out the door.

After a couple of minutes flew by, Mario barged into the royal castle, coffee cup still in hand and surprisingly in tact. Walking to the dining hall, Mario was about to take a sip but decided not to, just in case there was something in the room that would've made him spit it out. Upon arriving, that seemed to be a good choice as he looked around. The table was filled with all kinds of food, ranging from Mushroom Kingdom exclusive delicacies to tasty foreign fruit. Princess Peach was sitting at her table, gorging just as ferociously as she had been doing back at the Koopa Kingdom.

Mario gently put his cup down and ran towards Peach, hoping she wouldn't choke with how much she shoveled into her mouth. Once he was about a foot away from the Princess, Mario got to see what had happened.

Sharp claws now extended out of her fingertips and her mouth had become a maw of razorsharp teeth. Two horns spread from her forehead and underneath, her eyes were glowing crimson.

She could not take in any longer. This feeling, this pleasure, she could no longer hold it back. She opened her mouth and released an earth-shattering roar. This felt great, she thought. Now, no-one would ever again force her around. She would crush everyone who dared to try.

Examining her new body, she realized that her senses had also been heightened. She took a step forward, shaking the ground. Bowser's minions were a joke to her now. 152112222221.content:
It wasn't that Princess Peach was tired of her kingdom. Whether it was the cities, her subjects, or the work that was entailed in keeping the kingdom running smoothly, Peach could never get tired of the Mushroom Kingdom. But sometimes, she did need a vacation. Not just from her duties, but even from other aspects of her life. From Mario, from Bowser, from the whole usual suspects. Last time, she'd gone to Rogueport, though that hadn't exactly turned out very well. This year, despite Toadsworth's various objections, Peach was taking a personal boat out to Kong Isle.

As a princess, Peach was a woman of varied skills, and being able to sail on the open ocean was one of them. In point of fact, Peach found the entire trip, which she decided should also include wearing practical sailing clothes like denim jeans and thick shirts, to be quite invigorating. Toadsworth hadn't liked the idea of her taking this journey all on her own, hadn't liked traveling by sea instead of plane, and hadn't liked the choice of destination. The Kong family and their island lay outside the territorial boundaries of Mushroom Kingdom, but they had strong diplomatic ties, despite Cranky Kong's past issues with Mario and his old girlfriend Pauline.

Peach didn't personally know Donkey Kong, the current leader of the island, very well, as he was much closer with Mario. The ape had attended quite a few parties and kart races, but that could also be said of Wario and Waluigi, and they weren't exactly friends of Peach either. Finally, after a week on the open sea, she saw the island, easily visible from afar, unmistakable with the bulk of the island being in the shape of an ape's head. Once Peach had successfully tied her boat up to a tree near the shore, she started walking around the island, looking for a friendly face. She'd sent a letter ahead of her, had they not received it? Then, she did find something interesting, though it wasn't a person.
152112222221.title: A Trip to Kong Isle

152112222221112.content:
What Peach had found was a banana, just sitting on the beach sand. She wouldn't have paid much attention to it, but as her eyes caught sight of the fruit, her stomach let out a loud growl. Peach winced in embarrassment, not having eaten anything all day. Seeing as it was right there, Peach grabbed the banana and peeled it, eating it slowly at first. But as those mouthfuls went down her throat, her body began to change without her realizing it. Course brown fur grew all over her body, and with it came added mass, both in muscle and fat.

As the changes came, Peach's small bites became larger, just as her face began to push out into a simian muzzle, with larger teeth and a wide nose. Her clothes ribbed and shredded, but Peach was too busy with her food to notice the sudden nudity. But despite the fact no clothes remained on her new, ape-like body, she didn't exactly look naked. Instead, she looked like any Kong, no clothes needed for her buff, curvy body. Once the banana was gone, and Peach fully transformed, she looked down at her body and noticed for the first time how it had changed.
152112222221112.title: That's a Tough Kong.

choices: Cranky knows what did this, but has no clue how to reverse it.
Cranky doesn’t know what this is, but has a clue for a cure.
1521122222211121.content:
Even for someone who ruled the Mushroom Kingdom, where weird power-ups that change people’s bodies were common, this was out of left field. “Oh my!” Peach gasped, her normally light, high voice coming out a little lower and gruffer than normal thanks to her transformation. “The banana must have done this!” While Peach had nothing against Kongs, she didn’t exactly want to be one either. But who would she talk to about...

Then she remembered: Cranky Kong! The one who brought knowledge of the Kongs to the Mushroom Kingdom, after his fight with Mario all those years ago. For all his namesake crankiness, the old Kong was pretty knowledgeable, so Peach decided to seek him out for answers. While she didn’t know the exact locations of a lot of places on Donkey Konga Island, Cranky’s House was one of the few she was aware of, so after a short walk, she knocked on his door and entered. “Who’re you?!” he barked at her the moment she came inside, fixing her with a hateful glare. “You don’t look like any Kong I’ve ever met before!”

For some reason, Peach’s first instinct was to get angry at the old coot, and make it clear she wasn’t to be spoken to that way. But she shook that idea aside, and bowed her head respectfully. “I understand not recognizing me, since I look so different, but I’m Princess Peach, of the Mushroom Kingdom. I was sailing, landed here, and found an odd banana. When I ate it, it turned me into a Kong! Do you know what did this, and how to reverse it?”
1521122222211121.title: A Cranky Plea

choices: Peach decides to sail back home.
Peach tries to sail back home, but is captured by K. Rool.
15211222222111211.content:
Immediately, one of Cranky Kong’s hairy hands hit his face. “That was a Golden Banana.” The name rang a tiny bell in Peach’s head, but she couldn’t for the life of her remember how or why. “They’re pretty important to my good-for-nothing grandson. Problem is, if a non-Kong eats ‘em, they turn into a Kong.” That covered the first half of Peach’s question, but not the second. “As for how to turn back, I’ve got no clue!”

“Really?!” Peach shouted, anger rising. “I thought you were supposed to be smart or something?!” Then, without waiting for a reply, she turned and walked out, slamming the door behind her. Only once she was out did Peach realize how out of character that was for her. She normally never raised her voice like that, especially to respected elders!

It was seeming as though the change came with more than just physical changes. Putting that aside for the moment, Peach considered what to do now. She could try talking to Donkey Kong about the issue, but it wasn’t likely the big lug knew anything more about it than his grandfather did. Maybe it would be best, she considered, to sail back home, and see if anyone in the Mushroom Kingdom knew a cure.

1521122222222222121.content:
Suffice to say communicating with the toad was difficult, but he saw a transformed Peach instead of a common pink bob-omb. The first course of action in these situations is to tell the chancellor. Peach at first thought this was a terrible idea and tried to stop the toad but heard sizzling above her head when he turned to face the doorway... her fuse was lit. She quickly tried to will it unlit, and panicked when it reached the center of her fuse. She tried calling out for help to stop it, and two things happened. 1. She still couldn't talk so she couldn't make noise, and 2. the fuse seemed to stop by itself. She then heard a haggard sigh from the doorway. Toadsworth was already here, and looked like a nuke was about to go off... Actually that's not too far off... she thought to herself. He turned around and started talking to some of the servants... "I see... well I'm afraid panic is inevitable then. Find this "Rush" fellow in any way possible and tell masters Mario and Luigi if you find them. Have the tailors fashion something for her so she doesn't look like a commoner." The servants nodded, and went off to their new assignments. "Well your Highness I have good news, bad news, and neutral news."

The good news is there is someone who has gone through a similar predicament named 'Rush.' You may know him as a famous boat racer that appeared out of nowhere." Actually she did. "Rush" was a pale blue yoshi with a green mullet (think the yoshi kid from Paper Mario ttyd but longer,) an unzipped grey and black race jacket, and an unusual longsword. For a yoshi to carry a weapon let alone use one is strange enough, but what's even stranger is for one to build an (admittedly accident-prone) super-boat like the rusty-yet-trusty Miss Behave. She nodded as best a bomb on feet could.

"The bad news is he's gone for a challenge across a canal north-west of Rogueport that was recently refilled." Didn't Mario actually say something about a "Riverside Station" on our way out of the Palace of Shadow? Peach thought to herself. She bobbed her entire body forward again. "This means that unless Master Mario saved his boat and train tickets, you're going to be stuck like this for a month or two." Unpleasant...

"The neutral news is no, Bowser is not involved. Last we checked Kamek is still tending to the headcold he got from his last ridiculous scheme. On one hand we know Bowser's not trying to take the kingdom and gain a new front-line trooper while doing this, but on the other hand Fawful could be trying to avenge Cackletta or something of that nature." She nodded once more to ponder this. Before she could think however there was a cacophony of screaming toads, koopa and yoshi immigrants and other various creatures from out the window. Nothing seemed to be attacking Toad Town though and with Mario already out there trying to calm everyone (including Luigi) with the servants, it was pretty safe to assume that it was just her current predicament that was causing an uproar.

"Sounds like I'd better get down there and help master Mario. The tailors most likely know the situation by now, so try to stay calm when they arrive. Bob-ombs claim that their fuses are more prone to spontaneously light when they get angry or surprised." Peach nodded again and Toadsworth left to help the Mario Bros. Something seemed... off about Toadsworth though. Usually he's always a pessimist when something like this happens. "I'd hate to see something befall our Princess." he says. She didn't have much more time to think about it, because there was a knock at the door.
1521122222222222121.title: Princess in Peril

15211222222222221211.content:
It was the tailors. They pushed the door open not expecting a reply (with good reason) and the female toad and male goomba explained what they had produced for her "We hope that this will do for now. We were kind of in a rush and didn't have time, to give you any options." Peach didn't really care about her choices. She always wore the same dress with the exception of special occasions, like her body-suit or tennis dress. The first item they showed was a custom fuse that replaced her current rope one. It was a white plastic cable and was tipped with a blue gem much like the one she had on her dress, with a gold fuse-cap to hold it in place. The next was another custom item, a brass clockwork key shaped and spray-painted like a pair of fruit leaves. The toad helped swap the key and fuse while the goomba got the last item out. A simple pair of red heels, not unlike the one she wore before the situation, but obviously intended as another remove-and-replacement as there was an entire leg making them look more like boots.

"That gem is actually not a sapphire your highness." The toad said, placing the new fuse-cap on her. "We should actually explain that..." the goomba replied before continuing. "That's our entire deposit of a material called amarythian. What that will do is it will contain your negative energies if your fuse goes off because of fear or anger. Oh and it will turn violet if it's containing them." The toad nodded. "If you light it voluntarily it will make you reform faster after the explosion and provide a little more... shall-we-say 'oomph' to your attack. Not that you'll need it mind you." Peach nodded again and after her "transplant" attempted to walk but failed without her usual balance. Let's see YOU try walking without arms... or a torso. The toad and goomba chuckled briefly but politely stifled it before helping her up again. It took her a couple more tries but she managed to get from one side of the room to the other and literally jump onto her own bed.

"Well it looks like you've finally adapted to your situation. We'll leave you with a full-body mirror and be on our way." The toad left her business card in front of peach and went out the door with the goomba, who dropped the mirror in front of the dresser. "The old equipment is in the closet if you need it." "Doe T." Peach read to herself. Looking into the mirror she really did look like a bob-omb trying to cosplay as a peach fruit. It was actually rather cute in her opinion. I can't believe I'm saying this but drop the "mute" act and I could live with this.Now that her mind wasn't racing she could get a better look at herself in bob-omb form. Her eyes were black ovals with a pair of eyelashes protruding down from each, and looking closer she seemed rather small, even for a bob-omb. She also seemed... rounder if that was possible. Most bob-ombs had distinctive indentations or raises in their shape that made them discernible from others. Peach on the other hand showed no such sign of change in radius. Another knock on the door...

1521122222222222211.content:
We start our story in the iconic Toadstool castle where Princess Peach Toadstool had once again been returned from a recent kidnapping... National hero, Mario Segale, actually got Bowser in such a bad position this time that the Koopa King was forced to avoid an attack for several months now, thus leaving Peach to FINALLY get some paperwork taken care of. Mario and his brother Luigi could finally do their actual job as plumbers, the yoshis could relax for a time (and maybe establish tourism that comes naturally to tropical islands,) and they could finally consider becoming a part of the Mushroom Kingdom, one of several things Peach was addressing...

That wasn't what she was looking over however. On the contrary she was clearing out the complaints she'd received about security... Damn, that's a popular word... She thought, not voicing her thoughts for two reasons.

1. As royalty she shouldn't use that language, and it wasn't like she enjoyed using it anyway. She was gentle with her people and intended to be fair with them.

2. There was nobody else in the room, and even if there were they wouldn't be able to answer her next thought: I just wish I knew what the residents are thinking...

There were only Five humans in the Mushroom Kingdom as far as she knew, (or anyone else for that matter) Herself, the Mario Brothers, and their cousins Wario and Waluigi. The rest of the residents consisted of immigrating yoshis, rebel koopas, goombas returning to their original homeland (the fact that most goombas are traitors of the Mushroom Kingdom being a rather embarrassing part of the nation's history,) and the ever-incompetent toads. No one understood why, but they were usually cowardly and unwilling to stand up against anything. Not ALL of them mind you, but well over half the population.

Everyone found it odd that Peach, one of five humans in the entire kingdom, was the ruler of the kingdom, but they didn't care... She handled national issues well... Except for security... Because of the toads' unwillingness to fight in dangerous situations, the militia was near-nonexistent, due to lack of soldiers. I just wish I knew why they're always afraid... They're not as tall as most humans, according to Mario, but they still match the size of a pre-teen, so size difference isn't an issue... She then thought about her own size difference compared to Bowser. Then again if he's our usual problem...

As she finished for the night and closed her bedroom door she had one final thought before drifting off to sleep I just wish I knew what my people saw.

What does she wake up to?

Peach had only a few days left to her vacation and she then would have to go back to that dead end 9-to-5 on the mainland that she hated more and more these days. So she did not think she was being at all unreasonable. With so little time left, she wanted to spend as much of that time as she could in the water.
So she went by herself.
Peach had spent every summer vacation here in these islands when she was growing up. Mom and Dad loved the sea, and shared that love to her. So naturally, when she had the time and the money, she returned to the one place that made her truly happy.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Peach pulled into the parking lot in her beat-up old car. It was still early, she was the first one there though the sun was well up and the day was warm. That was the best part about going to the beach on a weekday!
She looked out at the water.
Absolutely perfect!
The waves were gentle to moderate. No tricky tides or currents to worry about this time of year. Not here anyway. It looked like the perfect time to get in the water!
Peach took of her dress and shoes and tossed them in the back. She had her bikini on already so all she needed was her fins, mask and snorkel. OOPS. Can't forget her knife. She never had to use it but knew she had better have it anyway. She strapped it to her right calf then grabbed her gear.
As she passed by Joes's shack, she tossed her keys into the mailbox. Joe would see them and keep an eye on her car. Good old Joe! He was a "dirty old man" but she loved the old geezer!
At last! Peach ran to the surf! She put on her fins just as her feet were getting wet. She stopped waist high and tended to her mask and snorkel. No need for heavy scuba gear today. Just being in the water would be enough.
A few joyful kicks and she were in heaven!
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
The water was perfect as always. Clean and clear, and summer warm! It felt absolutely delicious on her skin. Soothing and comforting, the sea washed away all of her cares and worries. It was like coming home at last . . .
Looking down she could see the bottom less than five feet away but getting deeper the farther from shore. Life everywhere! Hundreds of Cheep-Cheeps swam over the white sandy bottom and through the black rocks. A few Bloopers cruised by. But they were no worries. At over twenty feet deep, there were too many fish to count. They swarmed everywhere!
Taking a breath she swam down, down, down.
Hours went by as Peach played with the fish and reveled in their finny company. Whether she was on the surface, at the bottom or somewhere in between, they were good company. Lots of them were smart. But none of them were complicated. Unless they could smell food on you, they would ask nothing of you. They were content to share their world with you and enjoy the day.
Peach knew these places like she knew her own bedroom back on the mainland. She was as comfortable she and as "happy as Toady" as her royal buddies would say --- whoever Toady was! "Old shoes" her father used to call the feeling. This place was as comfortable as an old shoe. Memories of swimming here with her Mom and Dad brought tears to her eyes. She hugged the memory of them close to her heart. They swam with her still.
Looking at her watch, Peach saw that it was almost time for lunch. Where had the time gone??? Other people would be here soon. This time of the week, they always came flooding in after one. So she had better enjoy the solitude while it lasted!
1521122222222222222222212.title: Peach, the mermaid

15211222222222222222222121.content:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
What was that???
Peach was resting on the surface looking down at the sandy bottom of a grotto. Huge rocks surrounded her and littered the bottom. A wonderful place for fish! Almost unspoiled, it was one of her favorite places.
But she saw something gleaming down on the bottom where there should only be pale sand and black volcanic rock - - - ?
OOOH! The Koopa-troop made her so mad sometimes! Can't they leave things as they find them? Why do they have to trash these last perfect places with their sh*t?
Peach swam down to collect what had to be a beer can so she could take it ashore and dispose of it as its slob of an owner should have done.
But when she reached it, it wasn't a beer can after all. It was a golden statue just peeking out of the sand. Even under water it shown bright as gold! Polished and heavy, it looked Greek? It looked like a merman or triton, maybe Poseidon himself?
It certainly looked old. And felt it. It must have been lying here for a hundred years at least. But how???
Peach had been here many times, with Mom and Dad, or with friends. She knew the rocks here like old furniture. She knew the rock near where she found the statue particularly well. And froze.
Water still moved over her skin. And she could turn her eyes this way and that. But she could not move. She hung there, not sinking to the bottom or floating to the surface. Fish swam by her but she stayed, as stilled and lifeless as an image in a photograph.
Beyond panic, Peach could only look down. She watched, helpless, as the golden statue fell from her fingers. Its purpose served, it returned to the depths.
It would hide there in the sand only to appear where it was needed next. Here or in a thousand places like this under the sea. It was an instrument of ancient forces.
Not as ancient or as strong as the Creator, no. And certainly not as orderly, but very powerful and capricious. They had their own sense of balance. After all, the one thing that made this world truly beautiful was a dash of whimsy. Think of them as the twinkle in the eye of Miyamoto.

Small and soothing at first, it grew and grew until it filled her. Like coffee being stirred in a cup faster and faster until it washed the brim, the song flooded every corner of her mind.
Like pictures being taken down and forgotten, Peach lost all memory of her past life. She could feel them being taken away. No more Mom and Dad. No more twenty-fifth birthday party. No more rescuing. No more first love or first kiss. She lost the memories of her present. Mario, gone. Luigi, gone, and funny Old Joe. Peach lost all thought of her future. No more plans. Goodbye to dreams. Goodbye to the family she always wanted. Goodbye - - - everything.

Remembering last night's "intruder", Daisy looks down and pats her stomach a couple times, and somehow, Peach feels each impact. Her sight is also level with Daisy's bare belly.

Wait...but that means..!

It turns out that when Peach was digested, she became part of Daisy's abdominal muscles! Her physical form is gone, and her consciousness is forever trapped in Daisy's abs!

Not the worst Game Over for a princess, I guess...

152211.content:
One day, at Princess Peach's castle, Peach was walking around about to do some chores. Meanwhile....outside.....

Bowser was below his koopa copter, on top of a thwomp suspended by a rope tied to the copter. "Hwa hwa hwa! I'm going to make a surprise entrance for sure! That Mario's not gonna know what hit him when I get down there!" Bowser said. "Koopas, cut the rope!"

The Koopas nodded, as then then took out scissors and cut the rope suspending Bowser and the thwomp. They then fell down at a rapid pace.

Cut back to Peach....

Peach was walking around, minding her own business, when all of a sudden, WHAM! The thwomp that Bowser was on fell right on top of Peach and crushed her flat.

"Hwa hwa hwa! Now that I've crushed Mario out of the picture, all there's to do here is to kidnap Peach like I always do!" Bowser said.

Then, Peach, now flat as a pancake, waddled out from under the thwomp and moved in the way of Wario when he gets hit with the piston in Wario Land 4.

"Ouch...." Peach said, still flat as a pancake. "What's going on here today?"

"Oh Peach? Where are you?" Bowser yelled. "Come out here so I can kidnap you like always!"

"Um...sir?" Magikoopa said.

"What is it?"

"I'm afraid you flattened Peach when you landed on here. And Mario's not here to begin with either."

"WHAT?!?!?" Bowser said, getting off the thwomp and looking under where it had landed. "Where'd she go?"

Then, while Peach got away, she managed to bust out a little and pop back to her own shape.

"Ouch.....I'll still feel that for awhile." Peach said, wiping herself off. But just as as was walking by....
152211.title: Peach pancakes, anyone?

choices: ...A gigantic mass of bricks, thrown off a ledge by somebody else.
1522111.content:
As Peach walked back toward her castle, to have Toadsworth get Mario, she gave no notice to a large steamroller-like vehicle, heading right for her.

The Koopa driving also took no notice to Peach, only focusing on heading toward the castle. Bowser had plans to demolish the castle and rebuild it in his own image.

It wasn't until at about the last second that Peach noticed the large vehicle, it's cylindrical drum flattening whatever was in front of it. And she was next!

She tried to run, but the vehicle was much faster than the average roller. As it approached that castle, the driver began to slow the vehicle. Peach noticed this, but it was still to fast for her. Finally, it caught the back of her dress, She tried to keep running, but the vehicle stopped her. Finally, it began to roll over the rest of her body, slowly pressing every part of her body down onto the ground. Eventually, the vehicle passed over her, leaving a pancaked Peach lying on the ground.

She could only sit in place, her legs being smashed into the ground. Finally, minutes later, her legs finally peeled off the ground, and she began moving as fast as her still flattened legs could carry her, she somehow noticed Bowser and Kamek near the entrance to her castle, discussing something. She would have challenged Bowser if she were normal, but, with her being as flat as paper, Bowser would most likely take her back to his castle and place her in a picture frame on his wall.

This isn't good. Perhaps I can sneak away like this, Peach thought, as she began to slowly move away from the Koopas. Once she was off the castle grounds, she finally un-flattened herself, placing her hand on her head afterward.

"Wow. Being flattened is such a headache..." she said. However, she then whirled around after noticing a massive shadow looming over her, and then whatever she saw behind slammed down on top of her with much force. It was...
1522111.title: Flattened Again and Again

15221111.content:
Caught by surprise until the last second, Peach didn't have time to scream as a massive foot suddenly smashed her beneath it. As she felt the huge sole pressing her into the ground, she heard a muffled voice she recognized as Bowser's.

"You really didn't think that just because you were flattened earlier I couldn't see you, right?" he said, laughing. "I saw your pitiful escape attempt, and followed you here, using some of Kamek's magic to make myself giant."

Peach then said something, but it was barely audible beneath Bowser's foot. He laughed and said, "What's that? You want more? Well, okay then!" He then continued laughing as he twisted his foot from left to right. Peach didn't say a thing as Bowser continuously smeared her into the ground.

After a few minutes, Bowser's spell wore off. As he lifted his foot off the ground, he smiled evilly at the sight of having Peach, despite being flat as paper, all to himself. Peach, now dazed, did nothing as Bowser peeled her off the ground, folded her, entered his Koopa clown car, and took off for the flight back to his castle.

Peach, knowing that, folded up, she couldn't possibly escape Bowser's grasp, began to think. Once they returned to the castle, she would most likely be put inside a picture frame and placed in the castle. Or maybe she would be made normal, only for Bowser to once again stomp her, and have her mounted as a poster in his chamber.

However, during the trip back, Bowser released opened his fist and unfolded the princess. However, she was still a flattened disk, so he couldn't see much of her.

"Now all I need to do is destroy Mario, and nothing will stop me from having you all to myself."

"You had me squished flat just so you could capture me again!?" she said. "What's wrong with doing it the normal way!?"

"Well," Bowser explained. "Now I can hide you wherever I want...Maybe I'll use you as a doormat, and watch as Mario steps on you as he comes after he." He laughed.

choices: In the middle of the night
1522111112.content:
Bowser takes the flattened Princess and heads to his bedroom.
On the way there, the Koopa King grabs a roll of tape, "W-what's
that for?" The Princess asks, knowing what the answer would be.
"My Dear princess, you don't expect me to just leave you untied
not expect any funny business? After all, you don't become an evil
mastermind without learning a few things about your captives."

Once in the bedroom, Bowser muttered a few words and the Princess'
world expanded significantly, as she dwindled down, she could
hear the tell-tale sounds of tape being pulled from a roll. Once she
finally stopped shrinking, the Princess looked, a bit afraid, but at the
same time a bit aroused by the sight of Bowser's now giant toes, that
looked like buses to her.

Bowser then sat on the bed, picked the princess up and taped her
to the sole of his giant foot. "Plesant dreams, your highness"
the giant turtle said with a laugh, as he got into the bed and fell asleep.
Peach couldn't help but sit, breathing in the foul air that was emanating
from the Koopa King's foot, each passing minute getting more and more
aroused. Sweat droplets began to form on the humongous foot and bathed
the tiny princess. With nothing left to do, the defeated princess fell asleep.
1522111112.title: Sleeping with feet

15221112.content:
Peach looked upward at the cause of the gigantic shadow that surrounded her, and hardly had time to gasp as a massive pile of random blocks fell down from above on top of her.

"Augh!" she screamed as the blocks collided with her head and quickly pressed her into the ground.

As soon as the resulting smoke from the collision of the blocks and the ground, with Peach sandwiched between, cleared, the thrower of the blocks leaped down from the nearby ledge to get a clear visual of the results of their work, The various blocks the being had shoved down the cliff were scattered around, debris from various Brick Blocks everywhere, with the Mushroom Princess nowhere in sight.

After a few seconds, however, something pink and thin entered his line of sight. The person walked over to the object, and saw that it was Princess Peach, squashed into a disk shape against the earth. Her arms were stretched out in both directions, barely outside of the radius that her skirt, which made up most of her flattened form, now covered. The two panniers at the dress' waist were mostly covered by the once-puffed sleeves. Her face, which was also smushed against her dress and now covered her torso, although her brooch could barely be seen peeking out from under it, was facing skyward, and appeared to be shocked, her eyes widened, and her mouth gaping open. Her crown and earrings were also completely flat, with the crown still on top of her also flat hair. What was once the beautiful princess of the Mushroom Kingdom was now reduced to a pancake sitting on the dirt.

"Owwww," she gasped. "That really hurt... someone... help me..."

However, the person did not help her, but instead laughed at her. Peach saw who it was, and gasped in surprise. It was...
15221112.title: Pancaked Again

choices: Bowser decides to shape the flattened Peach into different forms
Peach pops her feet out of the ground and waddles away from Bowser to escape
152211121.content:
"Gasp! King Bowser!" Peach yelled, as Bowser let out a powerful laugh.

"Yes, it is I, my lovely princess. Did you honestly think you could escape my grasp even in a two dimensional form?" Bowser exclaimed.

"Well, yeah I did, actually." Peach quietly said.

"Well, you thought wrong! And now that I have you right where I want you, it's time to have things my way!" Bowser yelled, as he then stomped over to Peach's flattened form and stared down before doing something. Peach's pancaked face gulped as she only imagined the worse was yet to come....
152211121.title: ...Bowser! (or his minions)

choices: Daisy caught up to Peach, grabbed her, and threw her like a frisbee
152211122.content:
To her surprise, Peach looked up from her flattened form to see none other than Daisy, the Princess of Sarasaland, standing before her. Daisy was grinning with glee as she looked down on Peach like a giant to an ant at Peach's pancaked form.

"What is the meaning of this, Daisy?" Peach asked with an angry tone.

"Why, it's very simple, my dear Princess Peach." Daisy said. "For years, you have been in the spotlight in Mario and Bowser's eyes."

"But didn't Mario save you that one time many years ago?!?" Peach asked.

"Yes, but that was MANY years ago. In which there were many years following with you getting all the attention from Mario! Only once did that sad sack of a plumber gave me recognition! And Bowser? Don't get me started on him! When an alien who has only been relevant once has more affection for me, that's pretty sad. And it pisses me off!"

"So really, Luigi isn't good enough for you? It's all about Mario and his mortal enemy now?" Peach asked, still flat as a pancake.

"Hah! Of course Luigi isn't good enough for me. There's a reason his name starts with an L. Because it really stands for loser!"

"That's very cold! And what you are doing now is really uncalled for!" Peach yelled, still struggling to unflatten herself, bu to no avail.

"Hot, cold. Temperatures don't matter to me. What does matter, though, is that with you flattened like this, Mario will never find you attractive again! And he'll be getting the hots for me next! Now stay flat, as I find my true lover now!"

"I knew you were jealous of me all along! You won't get away with this Daisy!" Peach yelled, as she managed to pop her flattened, high heel clad feet out of the ground and waddled away from Daisy, trying to unflatten her body in the meantime and then proceed to put a stop to her plans.

"Where do you think you're going?" Daisy yelled, as she chased after the pancaked princess.

And then....
152211122.title: ...Daisy?!

choices: Peach pops her feet off the ground and waddles away to unflatten herself again
1522111221.content:
As the pancaked Peach waddled away from Daisy, still trying to unflatten herself, Daisy chased after her, intent on catching the princess to keep her from ruining her plans to steal Mario.

"Get back here right now!" Daisy cried as she chased after the flattened Peach. She did not listen, however, and continued to waddle away. However, Daisy jumped up into the air. The flattened Peach could only look up in shock as Daisy quickly descended down on top of her, the Sarasaland princess's high-heeled shoes roughly pressing her into the ground again. Daisy stepped off of the pink princess pancake under her feet, then leaned over and gently peeled the flattened Peach off of the ground, holding her up in her hands.

Daisy looked at her trophy with a smug look on her face. "Just give up now and save yourself the trouble. Mario isn't going to like a pancake princess when he can have a three-dimensional one like me."

"No! I won't let you do this!" Peach cried, as she continued to struggle to unflatten herself, to no avail.

"Well its not like you're going to anyway... Well, I guess I can spare a moment..."

And with that, Daisy tossed the squashed Peach like a frisbee. Peach screamed as she flew around through the air, the world above her quickly spinning around as she flew, Daisy smiling and giggling as the flattened princess flew through the air. Finally, she whirled around and flew back to Daisy, who caught her. She then looked down at her flattened victim, who appeared to be very dizzy.

"That was actually more fun than I thought it would be!" Daisy said delightedly, having enjoyed every moment of it. "But I can't stay here and play. I'm going to go find my true love, so you'd better stay flat this time!" She then dropped Peach and walked off, the dizzy princess in pink gently floating to the ground before recovering.

"Daisy... I have to stop her..." Peach said to herself as she tried to unflatten herself as she tried to pop herself back to normal again...
1522111221.title: Princess Frisbee

choices: A group of Thwomp's and Whomp's suddenly surrounded Peach, ready to squash her
Daisy gets a taste of her own medicine next, courtesy of Peach herself
15221112211.content:
A minute later, Peach manage to bust her feet out from under her flattened body again and proceeded to waddle off to a private place to unflatten the rest of her body.

"This is troublesome. I think this has to be the most times I've ever been flattened in one day outside of a Super Star Party." Peach thought, as she waddled off into the nearby woods. As she entered the woods, she saw a wide open space that wasn't being occupied by anyone. Peach's flattened face smiled as she waddled into the middle. As soon as she started to unflatten herself, a group of six goombas came out from behind the bushes and surrounded Peach.

"Heh heh. Afraid we can't let you get far, princess." a random Goomba said, as Peach gasped.

"Don't tell me...." Peach said quietly.

"Oh yes. Daisy has hired us as an insurance policy." another Goomba said.

"So that you have nothing to do with Mario again!"

"And soon, Daisy will become the new princess of the Mushroom Kingdom."

"But don't worry. You get to rule Sarasaland instead. A kingdom that nobody cares about and one that you can have all to yourself! Isn't life great?"

"But.....I don't want to rule another Kingdom." Peach said. "The Mushroom Kingdom is my home, and it's my duty to rule over it as it's princess!"

"Not for long it ain't!" the last Goomba of the group said, as they all chased Peach around the woods for up to a minute. Peach waddled around as the Goomba's were chasing down the flattened Peach at the same time.

"Come on! We finally have someone of our own size to pick on!" one of the Goomba's yelled, as they started to corner Peach.

"I can't keep running away in a flattened state forever." Peach thought, as she then reached a dead end. The pancaked princess then found herself surrounded by all six Goomba's.

"And now for the best part." the lead Goomba said, as all six of them jumped at Peach at the exact same time. Then, all of a sudden, Peach felt a huge adrenaline rush start to swell up within her. As she pushed hard to regain her three dimensional shape, she pushed forward like none other and within half a second, her entire body propelled itself from a one dimensional pancake to her former three dimensional glory. The princess had finally popped back into her original shape.

"Yes!" Peach yelled, as she then jumped out of the way of the six Goomba's, thus having them bonk heads and crash into each other. The Goomba's lied on the ground dazed as Peach landed swiftly on the ground again and dusted herself off from being flattened for what felt like an eternity.

"Phew! I thought that embarrassing moment would never end!" Peach said in relief, as she then turned her attention to the Goomba's.

"No no no! We didn't really want to do this! We swear!" the lead Goomba said, cowering in fear as the former flattened princess approached the group of Goomba's.

"....Too bad!" Peach said in a delightful tone of voice, as she then jumped into the air and consecutively stomped on all six of the Goomba's heads, flattening them in classic Super Mario fashion.

"Nrgh! Darn you! This isn't over! Daisy will reign supreme!" the squished Goomba's yelled, as they waddled off.

"And now you know how I felt!" Peach yelled, as she smiled and proceeded to walk out of the forest.

"And now we're gonna deal with Daisy once and for all!"

Peach then came out from the forest and into the overworld, where the Mushroom Kingdom castle was relatively far from where she was now. Daisy had to be there. Soon afterward...
15221112211.title: Peach pops her feet off the ground and waddles ...

15221112212.content: As Peach was struggling to unflatten herself, she heard a few footsteps approaching her current location. Her flattened figure only able to be looking up from where she was then saw a shadowy figure looming over her like a giant. Peach gulped as the figure turned out to be none other than...
15221112212.title: Someone else arrives...

choices: Does Bowser eat Princess Peach like a pancake.
1522112.content: She is flattened into a disk again. This time Bowser saw her.
1522112.title: A whomp that disguises itself as a wall falls o...

152212.content:
One clear summer day in the Mushroom Kingdom, Princess Peach was taking a stroll in the plains outside her castle. Armed with her parasol to provide her with a source of shade, Peach hummed to herself and joyously continued her walk.

"Such a perfect day outside!" she exclaimed. "Not a cloud in the sky, and the perfect weather for a nice stroll around the kingdom!"

As she continued to walk, however, she came across some a small field of beautiful looking flowers. Noticing them, she leaned over to smell them.

"Wow!" she exclaimed. "These smell amazing! Perhaps I can use these to liven up the castle a bit more..." she then began to pick the flowers from the field, while happily humming a tune.

However, on a hill nearby, a pair of Goombas and a Koopa Troopa looked down at the pink-clad princess picking flowers from the peak. Behind them was a massive boulder, held up on the hill by a small group of other miscellaneous minions.

"Target is in position," one of the Goombas stated.

"So tell me if I'm correct," the other one began. "We're gonna push this huge rock down the hill at Peach. The princess will notice it and run away. Then, she'll reach the trap we set up a distance from here, and fall down into the hole we dug, containing a cage which we then lift out of the hole and deliver to Bowser, right?"

"Precisely. Now get into position!"

The trio then ran behind the giant rock, and helped the other minions push it up the remainder of the hill. The Goomba looked down at Peach once more, and noticed she was still sitting where she was.

"Target is still distracted!"

"Perfect!" The Koopa replied. "Now commence Operation: Get the Ball Rolling!"

The entire group gave the boulder one more massive push, and it began to roll down the hill and toward Peach.

Peach, in the meantime, had just finished picking a bouquet of flowers.

"Perfect!" she said. "These will look amazing in the foyer!"

However, it was then that she began to feel the ground rumble.

"Huh?"

Peach turned around, and let out a high-pitched shriek of terror at the sight behind her as she suddenly began running.

A massive boulder at least twice her height was heading directly for her!

Peach continued to scream, eyes widened and letting out cries of help as she ran away from the giant rock. She looked behind her, and watched as it flattened the flower patch she was running away from. She was wearing her formal dress and heels, however, which greatly impeded her running speed, and she turned around to her horror every so often to watch as the distance she and the boulder were apart decreased. She was so close to it that it was casting a shadow above her, threatening to press her against the earth with every second it loomed behind her.

Really regret wearing this dress now! she thought as she struggled to keep ahead.

However, despite her best efforts, the boulder caught up the princess her, snagging the back of her dress' dark pink ruffle at the bottom.

"Oh my!" Peach screamed as she tripped and was quickly rolled over.

The minions watched from atop the hill as the event unfolded. After a while, they saw the boulder fall into the pit that they had created, and cheered at the success of their secret mission. However, when the smoke cleared, their expressions of glee turned blank as they saw something yellow and pink lying on the field.

"Uh..." the first Goomba .

"If Bowser asks, we had nothing to do with this, right?" Another asked.

"Right..." Their Koopa leader responded. "Now let's go back home and pretend we never left..."

At this command, the entire battalion of minions present ran off in varying directions.

Princess Peach, in the meantime, had been squished flat against the grassy plain. She was lying face down, her gloved arms stretched out both directions. Her hair, accessories, and dress were also like paper, her hair being flattened against her dress and her crown remaining on her head. If one could see her face, it would appear with widened eyes and a mouth opened in the shape of a small circle. Her earrings were flattened against her hair, and her bangs and top of her hair were stuck to her face.

How could this have happened... she thought. Who would even have enough of a motive to crush me with a boulder?

However, her thoughts were interrupted as she heard what sounded like somebody gasping behind her.

Huh!? she thought. Someone's noticed me! And they're going to save me!

Peach then felt a pair of hands grab her by the top of her flat hair and peel her off the dirt like a life-sized sticker. Her flattened form was then whirled around, and she gasped as she came face to face with the being currently holding her. It was none other than...
152212.title: Paper Princess Peach

choices: Princess Peach, squished flat on the bed.
Nothing; Peach is pressed against the chunk of ceiling.
1522121.content:
"Mario!" Peach exclaimed as she noticed it was Mario who was suspending her flat form. "Thank you for helping me now!"

Mario simply stood and stared at the flattened Princess Peach that he held up by her dress' formerly puffed shoulders. As he stood about with her, a gust of wind came by that blew Peach's lower half and head back. She gasped as most of her body flopped about in the wind. Seconds later, the wind stopped, and Peach returned to rest. However, she noticed that Mario's expression was still one of shock.

"Mario?"

"Huh?" The plumber finally returned to his senses. "Oh, sorry. Just not used to seeing you like this is all."

"That figures..."

"Anyway, how did you end up like this?"

Peach replied, "Well I was walking around near here a few minutes earlier when I suddenly saw some beautiful flowers that I thought could really liven up the castle. I stopped to pick some when a boulder suddenly appeared seemingly out of nowhere and smushed me. Now I'm here."

"Yeah, I saw the boulder, being rolled down at you from the hill from behind. Some of Bowser's minions wanted to trap you in a hole to kidnap you. I tried to stop them, but it seems I was too late..." He said, placing a hand behind his head and a nervous smile on his face. He held Peach up with a single hand by her waist.

"How about I take you back to the castle?" he asked, placing Peach's head in his palm when a breeze suddenly came about.

"That would be nice," she replied. "But you can't let anyone see me like this. Roll me up and carry me back that way."

Mario did as he was told. He folded her arms and head across her chest, then proceeded to roll her body up into a small, pink tube, which he walked back to the castle with in hand. He quickly approached the massive structure, not as far as one would think from their current location. As he approached the door, the two Toads standing guard at the front door smiled.

"Hey, Mario!" One of the two guards casually stated. However, he then noticed their rolled up, flattened monarch that was in his hand, though did not recognize her. "What's that you're carrying?"

Oh no... Peach thought.

"Oh this?" Mario said, holding her up. "It's just a poster. I'm going to give it to the princess."

Well, I guess it works...

"Sorry, but Princess Peach isn't here right now." The other guard noted. He then faced the first one.

"Speaking of that, shouldn't she have returned from her walk by now?" However, he turned his attention back to Mario. "But you can still go in, Mario." The guards stood aside, allowing Mario entrance to Peach's castle. He walked through the door and into the castle foyer. After wandering through the hallways for a while and giving "hello!"'s to the Toads he passed, Mario finally arrived at Peach's room.

He entered the room, which was filled with pink. The plumber walked over to the princess' bed, gently set Peach on top of it, and unrolled her flattened frame on top of it.

"Thanks again," she said. Despite her face still being in the same position it was when it she was squashed, Peach could still speak.

"No problem!" Mario replied. "Anything for you, princess."

Peach giggled at his comment. "If I weren't pancaked, I would hug you right now."

"That doesn't mean I can't." He then gently grabbed the flattened Peach off of the bed by her head and embraced her. Peach's armed were automatically hanging around Mario's neck, though her head flopped onto his shoulder. However, as soon as he was finished, he noticed that she was now stuck to his chest. He gave a laugh, then peeled her off of himself and placed her back on the bed.

"Once again, thanks for your help, Mario," Peach said.

"It was my pleasure," he replied. He then leaned in and planted a kiss upon her paper flat cheek, causing her entire face to turn red as she giggled for a second.

"I'll see you later," he said, closing the door behind him as he left.

Only about a minute after Mario left, Peach abruptly popped back to her normal shape.

"Huh?" she said. She turned her head, and noticed not only that she could move but that she was once again three-dimensional. The princess smiled as she rejoiced to herself. But the celebrations didn't last long, as she heard a noise coming from above.

"What was that?" she asked. However, she then began to scream. This was the last noise she uttered as a chunk of her ceiling fell down on top of her, something massive directly on top of that pressing her against her bed.

Oooh... I feel like I was trampled by a Chain Chomp... Wait, I feel...thinner all of a sudden... Oh no, not again!

Peach realized that the chunk of ceiling had once again crushed and flattened her. It was then that she heard someone with a deep voice speaking.

"Princess? Oh princess?" Come on, don't leave me alone here!"

Not him. Anyone but him. Please, don't let him find me. If Bowser sees me like this, I'm ruined!

Meanwhile, Bowser continued to rifle through Peach's room in search of her. After checking one of her drawers, he looked over at her bed. He kneeled down and looked underneath the bed, but did not find the pink princess underneath. He then stood up, and decided to check and see if she was under the section of roof he stood upon before it crashed down upon the bed in her room moments ago. He lifted the chunk and saw...
1522121.title: "Mario!"

choices: Pop her feet out of her flattened body to hide and get away from Bowser.
Nothing, because Bowser came back into the room and saw her.
15221212.content:
Bowser then lifted up the chunk of the ceiling that flattened Peach and set it on the side of the bed, seeing no use for it as he did no see anything there. Little did he know, Peach was stuck flattened into a disk shape on the other side of the ceiling the Koopa King neglected to check.

"Ah, darn it! I can't see the Princess anywhere! I'll just look elsewhere!" Bowser yelled, with a tone of disappointment in his voice. As Bowser left the room, shaking the castle with every step he took, the piece of ceiling started to flip to the other side with every shake that occurred. By the time Bowser was many feet away from the room, the chunk of ceiling was already turned over to reveal the bottom of Peach's flattened disk form on the other side, with only the bottom of her dress and flattened high heeled feet showing. Soon enough, Peach then became unstuck to the ceiling chunk and landed on the ground, spinning around like a coin and even making a spinning coin noise for a few seconds before coming to a complete stop, with her flattened upside becoming visible this time, face and all.

"This is embarassing." Peach said to herself. "I can't let Bowser see me like this!"

So then the next thing Peach did was....

15222111.content:
Peach wanted to tell everyone about her regression, but her kingdom was still in the middle of recovering from Bowser's latest attacks. There were no deaths, but a good chunk of the townspeople's houses were destroyed, and they feared Bowser's next attack would only get worse. Unwilling to make her people worry more than they already were, she decied to hide her regression for now, and tell a select few people later. She took one of her dresses and trimmed it to fit her new size, then filled the tips of her soes with paper to hide the fact that her feet had gotten smaller as well. She also put on a hearty dose of make-up, to try and replicate her usual facial features. The result wasn't perfect, but it had to do the job, as Peach was late for the meeting concerning Bowser.

When she entered the meeting room, everyone was already there, waiting for her. Mario, Luigi, Toadsworth and a few other Toads were present, and all of them had their eyes on Peach. The young princess couldn't help but feel nervous. What if they found out and word spread throughout the kingdom? Toadsworth, who didn't notice a thing yet, opened up by saying:

"Ah, at last! Now that Her Highness is here, we can begin the meeting. As you know already, Bowser recently attacked the Mushroom Kingdom again in the past few days. Each time he showed up, Master Mario and Master Luigi were quick to put him back in his place, but it seems like Bowser is even more agressive now than usual, sending more and more forces every time he strikes. In fact, it even seems like his army is actually growing every time he attacks. None of his attacks caused any casualties, but many Toads were forced to relocate while waiting for their houses to be rebuilt, and the populace fears that the attacks will continue rising in aggressivity. I must admit, even I begin to fear that he will take this opportunity to kidnap our beloved Princess Peach again. We've gathered this meeting to try and find a solution. We considered asking Master Mario and Master Luigi to attack Bowser and his armies by himself, but as I've said, his army is expanding, and Bowser might take advantage of the Masters' absence to strike even harder, and finally kidnap Her Highness. What do any of you suggest? ...Wait, are you OK, Princess? You look pale..."

Indeed, Peach looked pale and worried, for an idea struck her as Toadsworth was talking: Because she got younger after eating a strange new mushroom that she bought from the market the day before, what if other people bought similar mushrooms, and also started regressing in age like she did? Peach couldn't ignore that possibility, so she decided to...

152221121212.content:
"Well hello miss...... Princess Peach, is that you?!" Mama says in surprise. Peach sighs.
"Yeah, something happened to me last night and now I'm a teenager. I was on my way to fix it when I saw your make ad and decided why not, you're only young once. Or twice, in my case!" Mama smiles and nods.
"I guess so. So you want the works? I'm training, so everything is free."
"Sure, make me beautiful Mama" Peach says.

Mama goes to work. First she cuts Peach's hair to shoulder length. Then she goes to work putting in curlers. She sprays Peach's hair with solution and puts her under a dryer. While her hair is drying, Mama does Peach's makeup and nails. Once the perm is done, she rinses her hair and takes out the curlers. Mama brushes out the curls, then makes a few more cuts. Finally she is done. Peach has curly hair a little bit above her shoulders, in a teenage version of shirley temple curls. Mama completes the transformation with a butterfly beret.

"Here, before I show you, why don't you try on some new clothes to complete the look." Mama asks. Peach agrees. Mama gives her a tan sleeveless top and a white skirt that fits her teenage body perfectly. Finally, Mama shows Peach her reflection in a full length mirror. Peach looks a lot like this (just imagine her face and slightly blonder hair) http://horiwood.files.wordpress.com/2010...

"What do you think?" Mama asks.
"Wow. That's really me? I look so young." Peach is a little confused. She likes the new look, but she didn't expect to feel this childish with a more age appropriate look. In fact, if anyone saw now, they may not even recognize her as the princess, and just mistake her for a normal girl. Peach decided to push those thoughts from her mind and enjoy her look, as it would be short-lived. She thanked Mama and left the salon.

Peach makes her way to Mario's house to tell him what happened. She knocks on the door. When Mario opens it, he sees an unfamiliar girl on his doorstep.
"Hello Mario, it's me, Peach."
What does Mario do?
152221121212.title: Mama (She's training for a new mama game, S...

1522211212122.content:
"Mario, it's me Peach! I ate a mushroom and it turned me into a teenager. I need your help, I have to kiss Bowser to reverse it!" Peach said. Mario just shook his head.
"Very funny little girl, but that doesn't make any sense. There's no magic mushroom that makes you younger, and even if there were, why would kissing Bowser make it better? Besides, you don't even look like Peach. Get out of here and leave me alone." With that, he slammed the door shut. Peach tried knocking again, but Mario did not answer.

Peach was heartbroken! Mario didn't even recognize her! This makeover was a terrible idea. She had to go back to the salon and get as much of it as undone as possible. Maybe then Mario would believe her. What Peach didn't realize was that she was being followed. One of the goomba girls in the salon overheard Peach, and ran out and told Magikoopa about what happened. He'd been following behind ever since.

Peach walked back toward the salon. As she was walking near a small cottage, Magikoopa decided to make his move. He popped out from behind some bushes.
"Ha ha Princess, I have you now!" he said.
"AH! Magikoopa!" Peach screamed. She stopped in her tracks, looking for a weapon. Finding none, she started backing away slowly.
"Oh no you don't Princess, you're not going anywhere." Magikoopa raised his wand and fired a magical blast at Peach's face. Peach couldn't help but stare wide-eyed. The blast was a hypnotism spell! Peach was completely hypnotized.

What happens next?
