15222112121222.content:
Magikoopa is too busy hypnotizing Peach to notice a young woman sneaking up behind him. Magikoopa doesn't realize until it's too late, as the woman grabs his arm and points his hypno-spell at himself! He falls under his own hypnosis.

"What's going on here" the woman asks?
"This girl is Princess Peach, somehow turned into a teenager. I was going to bring her to Bowser, so I was hypnotizing her so she would come with me."
"I see. Magikoopa, you will go back to Bowser's castle and forget you ever saw the princess today. Now go!" the girl said. Magikoopa shook his head and teleported away.

The woman walked over to Peach. Although she looked like a young woman, she was really only 19 years old, but living on her own in the woods had given her a more mature air to her. In reality, she was a girl not much older than Peach's current age. She looked at Peach. She seemed to be coming out of the hypnosis, but she appeared very confused.

"What's going on. Where am I?" Peach asked.
"Don't worry about that. Are you okay?" the girl asked.
Peach shook her head to clear the cobwebs. "I think so." She still seemed lost. "Actually, know. I don't know where I am." Peach looked thoughtful for a moment, then said slowly "...or who I am."

The girl, who's name was Raven, realized that interrupting Magikoopa's hypnotism spell must have erased Peach's memory. Raven had nothing against the princess, after all she was a mushroom citizen resident, but she was also lonely out here. And she was also 100% lesbian, and she couldn't help but notice how cute Peach was. What should she do? Should she do the right thing and tell Peach who she is, or be selfish and keep Peach for herself?
15222112121222.title: The cottage owner intervenes

152221121212222.content:
Raven couldn't help herself. She was so lonely, and here was a beautiful girl her own age. She looked at Peach with concern.
"Don't you remember? You live here with me."
"I do?" Peach looked confused. "Are we sisters?"
Raven blushed. She knew she had to sell this. "Ummmm, no... Don't you remember?"
"Remember what?" Peach asked.
"You really don't remember anything? You don't remember that we live out here together as lovers?"

Now it was Peach's turn to blush. She was absolutely lost. This girl in front of her was her lover? Why couldn't she remember? Why couldn't she remember anything at all? Raven's faced went from expectant to dejected. Peach could see her lack of memory was crushing this girl. What she didn't know is that all those emotions were fake, for her benefit. Instead, her inner kindness only wanted to make this other girl feel better.
"I'm sorry, I don't. I don't even remember my name."
"Your name is Ashley, and we've been living together here for almost a year." Raven reached out and grasped Peach's hands. She ran her thumbs across them. Although Peach didn't recognize Raven, she found herself grateful for the human contact. She felt a little more anchored, not quite just drifting in her lack of memory.
"Maybe this will help you remember" Raven said. She leaned forward and cupped Peach's cheek with her right hand, then kissed her tenderly on the lips.

Peach was taken aback. Despite her lack of memory, Raven was a good kisser, and Peach could feel it. She was too confused to pull away, and let Raven finish this kiss.
"Now do you remember anything Ashley?"
Peach shook her head. "Not really. I'm so sorry." Raven gave her a hug, then took her by the hand and led her toward the cottage.
"Don't worry, come inside and I'll help you remember everything."
152221121212222.title: Do the wrong thing, who will know?

choices: The girls take it to the bedroom
There is a knock at the door
1522211212122221.content:
Raven spent the rest of the afternoon making up a background for Peach as Ashley and explaining it to her. She told her that they had met at a market near the palace a year ago and felt a connection. After a few dates, they realized they were in love and Peach/Ashley agreed to move in with Raven. They lived together in this cottage, growing their own food in the garden, making everything they needed themselves. It was a simple life, but they enjoyed it, and each other. Peach was still confused. She didn't remember anything Raven was telling her, but she didn't remember anything different either. And what Raven said made sense, and it explained why she was out here at the cottage. Why else would she be out there. Besides, at her core Peach was a kind and trusting person. Raven seemed to care about her a great deal, so Peach decided that it felt right to believe her.

"Wow. I can't believe I don't remember any of that. But it all sounds lovely Raven."
"Don't worry Ashley. We'll keep working on it. I will be here for you until you get back to yourself!" Raven said enthusiastically.

Peach thought to herself how lucky she was to have someone who loved her to help her through this. She decided that she would try her best to remember by living her life and seeing if it came back to her as she went. The first step, she decided, was accepting her name. Raven said she was Ashley, so Ashley was who she would be. Instead of thinking of herself as not knowing her name, she would make a firm effort to think of herself as Ashley. It already felt better just to have a name.

Ashley smiled. "Thank you so much. I'm so lucky to have someone like you to help me through this" she said.
Raven grinned and leaned in, planting a kiss on her lips. Ashley was caught off guard, but she didn't resist. She didn't kiss back, but she found herself enjoying the emotion directed at her by Raven. It was a quick kiss, after which Raven sat back down in her chair. Ashely wanted to show her appreciation, so she reached out and held Raven's hands in her own, looking deeply into her eyes. After a minute of affection, Raven jumped up.
"I know! Let's cook dinner. No memory ever came back on an empty stomach!"

Raven and Peach (now fully committed to thinking of herself as Ashley) cooked a delicious vegetable stew and salad. Ashley ate the food and thought it was the most delicious food she had ever tasted! Admittedly, she didn't have any memories to compare it to, but she was convinced even if she did she would feel the same way. After cleaning up, she and Raven went outside and laid in the grass, looking up at the stars. Raven told her about herself, about how she was one of 8 kids. Her parents didn't care too much about her at any point, but when she realized she liked girls and they found out, they kicked her out of her house. She was sixteen at the time, and she wandered the kingdom for a bit, then found a kindly farmer who let her stay with him. She worked the farm for almost two years, and by then the farmer had paid her enough to get this cottage, so she came out here to start her own life. She said she had only been alone for about 5 months when she met Ashley the first time. Now the two of them made money selling their extra vegetables, as well as some specially cooked foods, some crafts they made, and a few of their homemade dresses. Ashley just laid back and enjoyed listening to her talk. She was so comfortable, she didn't even notice when she drifted off to sleep.

****

The next morning Ashley awoke to the sun on her face. She opened her eyes and was confused. She was in a bedroom. What was going on? After a second of thought, her memories came back to her. It didn't take long, because all she had was memories from the day before. She realized she must have fallen asleep on the grass last night. But now she was in a big comfy bed, wearing a green night gown. She looked around and realized she was in the bedroom in the cottage. She pushed a curly lock of hair out of her eyes and looked to her right. Next to her in the bed lay Raven, looking at her with a smile on her face. The smile was contagious, and Ashley couldn't help but smile back.

"Why are you smiling so big?" she asked.
"Because I think it's cute, you waking up and not knowing where you are."
"You got me. I did not know. What happened?" Ashley asked.
"Well, you fell asleep last night outside. You had been through so much, I didn't have the heart to wake you, so I carried you inside, put on your nightgown, and put you in the bed."
Ashley felt genuinely grateful to hear friend for her actions. "Thanks Raven," she said, blushing slightly. Raven gave her a peck on the cheek.
"My pleasure Ashley."

With that, Raven got out of bed and went to fill up a bath. She let Ashley go first and get cleaned up. Then she led her to their closet (Raven's closet, which she said they shared all the clothes in). Raven helped her pick out a light blue strapped top and a kneelength white skirt. She slipped her feet into a pair of sandals. While Raven took her own bath, Ashley brushed her hair. After her hair was tangle-free and bouncy, she began looking through all the makeup supplies. Princess Peach never wore more than a little blush and some basic lipstick, but those memories were gone. Raven was a big fan of cosmetics, and had quite a selection. Ashley saw all the different items and came to the conclusion that they both must like to wear makeup, so she applied some red lipstick, eyeshadow, eyeliner, and blush. She then selected a pair of blue gemstone earrings and put them on.

After finishing getting ready, Ashley went to walk through the cottage again, trying to familiarize herself with everything there. After a few minutes, Raven joined her. Ashley looked at Raven. She was about an inch taller than herself, with the same creamy white complexion. She had dark black hair that hung to her shoulders, with bangs coming down to her dark eyebrows. She wore an obvious but not overdone amount of makeup, with three piercings in her ears and one in her nose. She was wearing a green strapped top that bared her midriff, and a brown mini skirt with boots on. Ashley thought she looked great.

She and Raven spent the morning exploring the woods. After lunch, they worked on sewing some dresses. As a princess, Peach had learned to sew at an early age. Even without her memories, she was still good at sewing. Finding out how skilled she was only reinforced in her mind that what Raven was telling her was true, she was Ashley. The same was true with cooking when it came time for dinner. By the end of the day, Ashley was more and more convinced things were exactly how Raven said they were. With this realization, she began to experience more feelings for Raven.

Ashley decided she would show Raven these feelings. After dinner, they cleared and cleaned the dishes. As Raven finished and walked to the den, Ashley walked over to her and embraced her.
"What's this for?" Raven asked.
"I wanted to show my thanks" Ashley said. Then she kissed Raven passionately on the lips. Raven was overjoyed that everything was going so well, and kissed her back.

What happens next?

She opened up the closet and picked out one of her many pink dresses, and placed on the nearby bed. Peach had begun to put it on, when...
152222222222211.title: Peach gets out of bed

1522222222222112.content:
Peach had begun to put it on, when she noticed a piece of paper on her bed; "what's this?" she said. Peach picked up the paper, and it appeared to be some kind of letter. The letter contained the following message:

Dear Peach,

You are probably wondering why you woke up in a diaper this morning. Well, I'll be blunt; it is part of an experimental spell, and what you are now wearing is the result of said spell. It's nothing personal, but I needed a test subject that was pure and innocent and you fit the bill perfectly. I'm sure you're not very pleased with this situation, but let me assure you that there's nothing life-threatening about it. What I am testing is a spell that can indefinitely numb the nerves in a person's bladder; something that may prove useful against enemies to our kingdoms.

Basically, this means that - for the time being - you will have little to no control of your bladder whatsoever. In addition to this spell, I have included a special diaper in order to help manage any issues that you may have. Your new "panties" will only come off if you visualize taking them off; you can also "change" it by visualizing a dry diaper (you might want to do that in private, just to be safe). I have also included a cloaking mode that will muffle the sound and sight of it under your clothes; all you have to do is (you guessed it).

I apologize for the inconvenience I will undoubtedly cause you, but what you will be going through will one day be a big help in the fight towards the likes of Bowser and his minions. That being said, try to enjoy yourself as best you can (I made the diaper thick and extra soft for your comfort ).

Once again, sorry!
Best wishes,

Princess Rosalina

After finishing the letter, Peach felt a little peeved but was understanding of Rosalina's efforts. "At least she's doing this for the good of the people...I suppose." she thought. "Besides, this can't be all bad" Peach said, and she followed that by patting her diaper; it was very soft, almost like a cloud. "She was right, this is one of the comfiest things I've worn in my life!" Peach said, upon doing so her face turned bright red and she giggled.

Peach shook her head a bit, and returned to getting dressed for the day; all of a sudden...
1522222222222112.title: She noticed a piece of paper on her bed

choices: She decided to wait a bit
15222222222221121.content:
Peach shook her head a bit, and returned to getting dressed for the day; all of a sudden she felt a very weird sensation. "I feel strange," she thought, Peach figured it was nothing and continued putting on her dress. The sensation persisted, but Peach could still not determine what exactly it meant. She stepped into her dress and pulled it up until it reached her waist. Peach then put each arm into the proper sleeves and then pulled the zipper on the back up to the back of her neck. The dress was done, now Peach needed some stockings for her legs and her white gloves.

Peach rummaged through her dresser for the missing items; she put on the gloves first, and then she sat down on the bed to put on her stockings. When she sat down, Peach this time took note of the diaper under her butt "I could get used to this extra padding!" she said cheerfully. Peach pulled up her skirt, and began pulling the stockings up her legs to the snaps located on her garter that was sitting over top of the diaper. Peach got the first one locked in place, and stopped once again; that sensation had returned, but this time it was a little different. Peach felt a little tingle, and still thought nothing of it; however, once she clued into the now audible hissing that filled her ears, she quickly realized what that sensation was. It was her bladder, and she was in the midst of peeing herself.

Peach froze for a bit, and let nature run its course. She had to let it all sink in: she was wetting her diaper, and she was not even aware that she had to pee. It then dawned on Peach that those weird sensations from before were from her body trying to tell her that she needed to urinate. "Oh my, this spell really does work; I couldn't even tell that I had to go!" she thought; Peach looked up and almost screamed "I have the bladder control of a baby!"

The hissing stopped; Peach's diaper was warm and damp, at which point...
15222222222221121.title: She felt something strange

152222222222211212.content:
The hissing stopped; Peach's diaper was warm and damp, at which point she continued to sit on the bed for a brief moment. "I just wet myself; I don't know how to feel right now..." she thought. Peach lifted her skirt up to her waist, so that the diaper was once again visible. Upon first sight she noticed that the diaper looked largely the same, but was now accompanied by a small, yellowish patch around the bottom. Peach then took her hand and felt the diaper; it was not too wet around the yellow area, and still dry otherwise.

Peach smiled and said "well, that wasn't too bad. I don't really see a reason to change yet, either; I mean, it's not like my diaper's overflowing or anything." Peach rose from her seat on the bed, the dress falling back to her feet as she stood. "Situation aside, it's about time I went downstairs to start the day," she thought. Peach walked over to her bedroom door, but before she could open it...
152222222222211212.title: She decided to wait a bit

1522222222222112122.content:
Peach walked over to her bedroom door, but before she could open it a familiar voice filled the room: "glad to see you're still in high spirits." Peach turned to face back at the bedroom, "...Rosalina? Where are you?" she asked. "Just a second," the voice replied; in what seemed like an instant, the interplanetary princess materialized right in front of Peach. Rosalina presented a warm smile and spoke: "Hello, Peach; how's my test subject doing?" Peach became a little miffed with that opening "test subject?! I still don't fully understand why I was the best fit for such a silly experiment!" Rosalina replied, "oh, I'm sorry; I didn't mean to make you angry, but I really do think you're the best candidate for the job."

Peach closed her eyes and turned away, her back now facing Rosalina; "I'm not really angry, I'm just a little annoyed that you didn't simply ask for my permission." She turned her head back to see Rosalina and said "...by the way, what was the reason that I was--" Peach stopped mid-sentence. Rosalina had disappeared. "Rosalina?" she called, but her question was immediately answered when she felt something on her backside. Peach looked down to find Rosalina lifting up her dress, patting her diapered butt; Peach then heard "aw, you look so adorable with this big diaper on! Oops; looks like someone had a little accident this morning, tee hee!"

Peach spun herself around and looked down to the smiling space-dweller; "you done?" she asked. "Sorry, I couldn't resist; you were just so cute!" Rosalina giggled. Peach shook her head a bit, she then asked one more time "so, why was I the best candidate for this in the first place?". Rosalina paused for a moment, finally answering "well...I figured that a close friend of mine would be able to provide the best feedback during the course of the experiment." Peach was a little surprised by this response; her face turned red, "that's really sweet, Rosalina. I guess since you put it like that, I feel better about being in a diaper indefinitely." Peach smiled at her guest, Rosalina replied in kind and said "thank you, Peach; that means a lot to me."

The two just stood silently for a moment, after which Rosalina said one more thing "well...there was another reason." "What's that?" Peach questioned. "I also based this choice on the fact that you would be the least opposed to wearing a diaper." "W-why d-do you say t-that?" Peach stammered to which Rosalina replied "let's just say that amongst my research of possible subjects, I accidentally discovered that you weren't potty-trained until you were seven years old."

Peach's face turned bright red, it took all of here willpower to keep from screaming; in the end, she dropped to her knees and cried. Rosalina walked over to the mushroom princess and consoled her "hey, it's okay; I'm not going to tell anyone. I just happened to find it in a private file, that's all." Peach continued bawling "I can't believe you found out about that! You chose me because I wore diapers until I was seven?! WAHHHHH!!!" "Peach! calm down! someone might hear you!" Rosalina said in a panic. Peach was a complete basket case at this point, amongst her crying she gasped "I think I just wet myself again! WAHHHHH!!!"

Rosalina was at a complete loss for words; in an instant her friend went from a calm, level-headed individual to a blubbering mess - in more ways than one! "Peach, please!" Rosalina pleaded "just quiet down! I need you to be a big girl, here!" Peach gasped out "how can I?! you just found out that I went potty in my diaper...again!" "It's okay," Rosalina said calmly "just calm down, and we can change your--" Rosalina was interrupted by Peach once again, but this time by Peach grabbing her legs; causing her to crash to the floor. Peach nestled her face into Rosalina's abdomen, "I'm sorry, Rosalina!" she cried "I know it's not your fault, I just - it's just that -" suddenly, Peach stopped everything. Her face was still buried in Rosalina's waist; she had stopped because she felt an odd "softness" where Rosalina's panties should be.

"Wait a minute," Peach said; "Peach, hang on a second!" Rosalina pleaded with her former basket-case of a friend. Peach rose to her knees and slowly hiked up Rosalina's dress, the softness that she had felt gave everything away. For whatever reason, the interplanetary woman was also in a diaper! Peach could only stare at the big, white diaper hugging Rosalina's waist "Rosie, what the - you too?!" Rosalina could only reply "Well...you see..."
1522222222222112122.title: She heard a strange voice

15222222222221121221.content:
"Now this really doesn't make sense!" exclaimed Peach, still confused as to why Rosalina would be wearing a diaper. "Peach, just calm down for a second and let me explain." Rosalina replied; at this point, Peach was in such a state of shock that she simply tuned her out. "Oh God, don't tell me that you haven't even found a way to end this spell yet!" Peach said; Rosalina tried to get a word in, but Peach continued to interject...

"That's not it at all, it's just tha--"
"You tested this on yourself first, didn't you?!"
"It's not that, if you just let me spe--"
"You put the spell on yourself, and now you can't figure out how to end it? You used it on me so that you wouldn't be alone! I can't believe this!"
"Hey, that's not true!"
"What else could it be? Oh, now we're both stuck like this!"
"If you just let me finish a senten--" Rosalina had grown quite impatient, and looked ready to explode; Peach didn't notice and continued...

"We're stuck like this forever! I have to spend the rest of my life soiling myself over and over again! What man would want a big baby like me--"
"PEACH, PLEASE LET ME FINISH! YOU'RE ACTING LIKE A CHILD!"

The room was dead silent; both women simply looked to opposing walls for a moment. After some time had passed, Rosalina felt calm enough to explain the situation:

"I have tested the spell thoroughly; it wears off after a couple of weeks, after which you will be perfectly alright. I did test on myself initially, but it has since worn off and now my body functions normally. I wanted to test on a second person just to ensure that nothing else strange would occur. That's all there is to it; you have my word."

Rosalina looked back to face Peach again, who was still gazing off to the side; "so...I'm safe, is what you're saying?" she said. "Yes, there is a slight chance something might happen, but my research has showed that the chances of that are almost non-existent," Rosalina answered. Peach sighed "that's a relief, and I apologize for...being such a brat before." Rosalina's face became a little flushed; she looked up and replied "Oh, don't worry about it; to be honest, I would have probably reacted in the same manner."

The two had more or less made up, but there was one more thing that Peach needed to know. "Wait, you said that you tested the spell on yourself first, and it wore off?" Rosalina looked a little puzzled, but nodded to confirm her query. Peach continued, "so if the spell has worn off, why are you wearing a diaper?" To this, Rosalina could only reply with "because I like wearing one."
15222222222221121221.title: Rosalina's padded, too?!

152222222222211212211.content:
Peach didn't know how to respond to that answer "you like wearing one? You mean, just because?" "Well, yes," Rosalina answered "I guess it is a little strange, but in the couple of weeks that I spent with no bladder control I grew accustomed to wearing a thick diaper. After the spell ended, I was so used to them that I just stayed in diapers since that day." "How long ago was that?" asked Peach. Rosalina had to stop and think for a moment "Hmm...I guess...three weeks or so? I kinda lost track, I've been doing research most of that time and the days just flew by."

"I understand, but there's a few more things I want to know," said Peach, "are you going to wear them all the time from now on?" Rosalina chuckled a bit, then answered "I guess so; I made these so comfortable that I just can't imagine life without having a nice, big cushion under me anymore!" "Well, you're right about that," Peach giggled. She finished laughing and asked one more question "do you still...use your diaper?" Upon hearing this, Rosalina's face turned completely red "well...yes - I mean, no - or rather, sometimes?" "What does sometimes mean, Rosalina?" questioned Peach.

By now, Rosalina had wished she had kept that part to herself; she began listing off numerous instances in which she wet her diaper regularly:
(Peach) in brackets
"When I'm in bed." (What?) "I don't want to get up to use the toilet!"
"If it's cold outside." (Why?) "Because wetting yourself can warm you up a bit!"
"When I watch movies." (...) "I laugh at everything, and I scare easily!" (Fair enough).
"When I'm on the toilet." (Wait, what?) "Sometimes I sit there, pull up my skirt and just go in my diaper! It feels kinda nice!" (Okaaaay...)
"Sometimes...I just have an accident!" (Well, nobody's perfect)

"Are you happy now? I can't think of anything else to say to make it clear: I like wearing diapers!" Rosalina ended. Peach walked over to the space noble and sat down next to her; "it's okay," she said "there's nothing wrong with that at all. I mean, when I wet my pants this morning - before you came - I...kinda liked it too." Rosalina looked up at Peach "really?" she asked, "you don't think it's strange?" "Not really," Peach replied, "it felt warm, and my legs were all tingly and stuff; I'll admit that I liked the sensation of it." "And I'll be frank with you, Rosie," she leaned in close to Rosalina "your diaper is the comfiest thing I've ever worn. I don't want to take it off anytime soon!" Rosalina couldn't help but smile "I had a feeling you would grow to like it!"
152222222222211212211.title: Peach questions her further

1522222222222112122111.content:
Rosalina stood up, "well, I suppose I should be on my way." She looked downwards to Peach, who was still sitting on the floor next to her bed, and said "I'm glad that we could work everything out." Peach smiled, and then replied "me too, Rosalina, and after what we talked about here today I'm pretty happy with this predicament."

"So you're sure that you're alright with...not being potty-trained for a while?" Rosalina queried. Peach looked at Rosalina with a playful smirk and replied "That? Please. I was diapered until I was seven, I think I can handle not knowing how to use a toilet for a couple of weeks." Rosalina laughed, "it's good to see you in such high spirits, Peach!" Peach joined in the laughter; shortly after, she was reminded of her inherent wetness. "That reminds me, I need a change badly," said Peach. "I'm pretty sure that I did pee myself again during my outburst earlier;" she lifted up her dress and showed Rosalina her diaper. "I don't mean to make fun, but that's just so cute!" Rosalina held a hand to her mouth as to hide her giggling. Peach stuck her tongue out at her friend.

Peach let go of her skirt and let it drop back to the floor; she smoothed it out a bit and exhaled, "Ok, so I just have to imagine myself in a fresh diaper, right?" "That's all there is to it," Rosalina cheerfully replied. Peach closed her eyes and focused on changing her diaper; A few seconds later, a magical aura surrounded her waist. A wind from the aura caused her skirt to raise again to waist level, now leaving her exposed diaper to be covered by the magical light. As soon as it began the magical aura left Peach's body, and with it disappeared the mysterious wind; her dress returned to her feet once again. "I'm...dry...wow! It worked!" she exclaimed.

Peach looked to Rosalina with excitement "I can't believe it! This diaper is amazing! It feels soft and dry again!" Rosalina smiled at her pink-clad friend "it's nice to see the fruits of my labour from another point of view." She continued "well, Peach, I think it's safe to say that you'll be just fine here. Now I really must go; I have to prepare for another event later today." Another aura appeared around Rosalina; as it enveloped her entire body, she waved farewell to her friend. "Goodbye, Rosalina!" Peach said, "and thanks for all your help!" Just before Rosalina vanished from the room entirely she replied "have fun, Peach! I'll see you very soon!"

With that last sentence faintly echoing in Peach's bedroom, Rosalina had disappeared. After that, Peach had a moment to herself. What a morning, she thought. She sat back down on the bed and let her body go limp for a moment. Peach laid out on her bed and just stared at the ceiling, gathering her thoughts; life back in diapers, I never thought that I would experience this again. Before she got too comfortable, Peach heard a knock on her bedroom door...
1522222222222112122111.title: Rosalina finally departs

15222222222221121221111.content: "Hey-a-Peach! I'ts-a-Mario! Ready for our-a-golf tournament?" Peach frowned. She had completely forgotten about the tournament. "Oh, Mario, I'm sorry! I completely forgot!" "It's okay-a! We've got a few-a-minutes! I'll-a-be in the parlor, with-a-toadsworth!" Peach closed her door. she sighed, and turned toward her closet. opening her door, she found...
15222222222221121221111.title: Peach answers the door

1522222222222112122112.content:
Before the conversation could carry on any further, it was disrupted by a loud knock; someone was at the door. "Well, I guess that's a good cue for me to leave," Rosalina said in a quiet tone. She turned to Peach one last time and smiled, "sorry for being so abrupt, but I have something that I need to attend to before tonight." Before Peach could even respond, an aura enveloped Rosalina; in what seemed to be only an instant, she had vanished. Peach was alone again; now all that was left was to see to her unknown visitor.

"Who is it?" Peach called out. The visitor replied with a familiar, grizzled voice: "it's Toadsworth, Princess; I just wanted to check in with you this morning." "Oh, no problem, Toadsworth; can you just give me a moment? I'm...not quite ready yet," Peach asked. Toadsworth replied, "not at all, miss; take your time."

Peach stood up and walked over to her vanity mirror, just to make sure that she was presentable. Oh, that reminds me, I need to change this diaper, she thought. Peach took a second to remember what the letter had instructed her to do, then it came back to her - I just have to imagine it! Peach closed her eyes and imagined herself in a fresh diaper; not long after, a strange magic swirled around her waist and changed the diaper that Peach was wearing.

Peach opened her eyes. She was a bit puzzled at first, so she decided to lift up her skirt to investigate the results; lo and behold, her diaper looked completely dry. "I can't believe that actually worked!" Peach said. "Princess? do you still need some more time?" Toadsworth's voice emanated from the door again, to which Peach replied "no, Toadsworth; you can come in now."
1522222222222112122112.title: Someone was at the door

choices: The two head down to the main hall
15222222222221121221121.content:
Toadsworth entered the room, the old Toad greeted Peach. "Good morning, Princess," he said; "you didn't come down to the main hall earlier, so I thought I would just make sure you were doing alright." Peach smiled and replied, "that's alright, Toadsworth; I just took a little longer than expected getting ready this morning." "Oh, is that all?" Toadsworth said "after talking with her recently, I thought that maybe Rosalina had stopped by this morning to see you." "Oh no, I just overslept a -" Peach stopped mid-sentence, realizing what Toadsworth had just said; "wait a second, Rosalina talked to you? about what?"

Toadsworth's mentioning of Rosalina had left Peach a bit surprised. He decided to fill the princess in on their conversation: "Why, yes. I talked with her a couple of nights ago, she set up the meeting in order to discuss her planned - how should I put this - controlled experiment involving you." Peach's face flushed, "don't tell me that...she told you about..." her voice quivered a little as she spoke. "Rosalina told me about her spell, and the...side effects of it," Toadsworth answered. Peach let out a big sigh, "I was hoping that I could keep this to myself."

"Now Princess, there's nothing to be embarrassed about," said Toadsworth. "I'm not really embarrassed, Toadsworth," Peach replied; "I just wanted to keep this a private matter - very private." Toadsworth tried to console Peach, "I understand, my girl, but rest assured that I will not breath a word of your...bladder issues to anyone." Toadsworth took a more cheerful tone "besides, this could be enjoyable for you. I remember how much you liked wearing diapers as a little girl, despite the hardships you had faced during that time."

Peach's tone became very serious when she next spoke: "that reminds me; did you happen to tell Rosalina anything about my...upbringing? she had mentioned a file covering that." Toadsworth replied "*sigh* Yes. I gave her a file with some of your personal information to help with her research, and that was included." Peach's only response was a frustrated exhale. "Well, what's done is done, but I wish that you hadn't included my potty training issues."

"I'm sorry, Princess," Toadsworth said; "I know that you don't like talking about it, but considering her spell's nature I felt that it was necessary for Rosalina to know." Peach responded politely to her aide, "I understand, although I didn't take it very well when heard it from her." Toadsworth continued, "well, if it makes you feel better, I worded it as such:"

As an infant, Princess Peach was captured by a terrible villain. She had spent several weeks in captivity, guarded and terrorized by a number of stationary Piranha Plants. Peach was eventually rescued and returned to us unhurt, but there came a psychological trauma. The whole experience had caused the Princess to be deathly afraid of all pipes and plumbing for quite some time, sinks and toilets included. I knew it was bad when I had tried to potty train Peach about six months later; she was haunted by her capture so badly, that she was absolutely terrified by the mere sight of a simple toilet. Needless to say, her first reaction was to scream and run away; I found her hiding in a closet crying, and she had soiled herself during the ordeal.

The Princess exclaimed that she never wanted to go near a toilet again. I decided at this point that I would respect her wish, and as such we allowed the Princess to continue wearing diapers. I would be nearly five years before she no longer felt threatened by normal household plumbing, by that point she was ready to take her diaper off and face her fears. It was a very long process, but I feel that this was the best option given the situation. Peach otherwise grew up as a very healthy and happy child, and we decided to treat the situation as if it were normal for a girl her age to still wear diapers.

Peach walked up to Toadsworth and knelt down to talk to him at eye level, "I'm sorry for being upset, Toadsworth; I'm glad that you at least explained the full situation to Rosalina. I guess I'm still a little sensitive to the whole thing." Toadsworth took his hand and rubbed it on Peach's cheek, "no need for apologies, my girl; you know that I respect you, and that I would never make light of such instances in your life." Peach blushed a bit, "thank you, Toadsworth."
15222222222221121221121.title: Toadsworth enters the room

152222222222211212211211.content:
Peach and Toadsworth remained quiet for a moment, although to them it seemed like much longer. Eventually, Toadsworth ended the silence "Oh, I almost forgot; I had another bit of news, Princess," he said. Peach was a bit puzzled, as far as she knew there were no pressing events coming up, what could it be? Toadsworth spoke again, "I thought it would be good for you to have some time to adjust to your new arrangements; so I've taken the liberty of planning a little weekend holiday for you at the summer house."

Peach's face lit up when she heard Toadsworth's announcement. "Toadsworth, I don't know what to say; that sounds great! Thank you so much!" she said, it was clear that she could barely hold in her excitement. Toadswoth chuckled, "I thought you might like my proposal; you'll leave a bit later today, in order to give you time to pack." Peach nodded, "sounds good to me. How long am I going for?" "Oh, just for the weekend, Princess; you'll leave this afternoon and come home some time on Sunday evening," Toadsworth answered.

"That'll be perfect," Peach said, "if you'll excuse me, Toadsworth; I need to start packing!" Toadsworth pleasantly replied "of course, Princess; I hope that you have fun this weekend!" He bowed to Peach, and then turned around to leave the room. After Toadsworth's departure, Peach walked into her closet and began sifting for clothes to take along for the trip. A weekend to myself... she thought; amidst Peach's searching, she began pulling out her summer clothes. She took the pile of clothes that she had decided on and laid them out on the bed; she grabbed a pink miniskirt and held it up to her waist, I'm gonna have some fun with this!
152222222222211212211211.title: Toadsworth has some other news

1522222222222112122112111.content:
...Peach opened her eyes to find herself in the back of a car. "Must have dozed off," she muttered; she stretched her stiff muscles as much as she could in the back seat. After she finished stretching, Peach looked out the car window to see the summerhouse off in the distance; they couldn't have been more than ten or fifteen minutes away by now. She rested her head on her hand, which was propped against the headcushion of the seat; Peach placed her other hand in her lap.

When her hand touched her lap, Peach felt something damp. I'm wet; I must have peed my pants after I nodded off... she thought. Peach glanced over at the driver just ahead of her; there was a glass window that separated the front seat from the back. The driver noticed that Peach was awake again, "good afternoon, Princess," he said; "we should be at the summerhouse in a few moments." "Thank you," Peach answered, I'm glad that window was there, he shouldn't have heard me peeing. Peach went back to looking out the window, I guess I'll wait to change at the house... she thought. Peach continued to gaze out the window at the lush scenery, well, I have no choice; I can't exactly say "can we stop? I need a diaper change!" like when I was a little kid. Peach giggled a little bit at her last thought.

A few more moments passed before the car stopped. Peach took this as a signal to undo her seat belt and exit the car. She stepped out of the car and stretched before retrieving her things from the trunk. The driver emerged from the car; he asked the Princess "did you need any help with taking your bags into the house, Princess?" "Thanks for the offer," Peach replied, "but I just have the one suitcase, so I should be alright doing it myself." "Say no more, Princess," the driver said "well, other than that, I hope you enjoy your stay. I'll be back to pick you up on Sunday evening." Peach thanked the driver again and grabbed her suitcase from the trunk before making her way to the house. She slammed the trunk shut and waved to the driver before she made her way to the front door.

The car pulled away from the summerhouse, and Peach made her way to the front door of the house. She opened the door and closed it behind her; she left her suitcase in the alcove between the door and the main floor of the house and walked over to the window. Peach saw the car drive down the road and slowly disappear beneath the hills, "finally, my weekend can begin!" Peach excitedly ran over to her suitcase and took it up the stairs to head to the master bedroom; she giggled on the way up as her diaper crinkled between underneath her dress. Peach arrived at the door to the bedroom and opened it, which unveiled a very large, furnished room with a massive bed in the center of it.

Peach carried her suitcase over the the large bed and set it down right next to it, she then preceded to flop out on the bed and take everything in. "A whole weekend of fun!" she said, "I can sleep late, eat junkfood, play video games; I can even watch scary movies without worry!" (like Rosalina, Peach gets a little too scared during movies sometimes). "First thing's first, though," Peach said, "I'm gonna get out of this dress!"

Peach got off the bed and unzipped the back of her pink dress; she pulled her arms out of the sleeves and let the dress fall to her feet. She was now only covered by her diaper and her thigh-high stockings; Peach pulled her suitcase up onto the bed and opened it up to reveal a cache of new clothes to wear. Peach then climbed back onto the bed, she rested on her knees and began flipping through clothes; her diapered butt waving around in the air behind her. After a moment of searching, Peach emerged from the suitcase with her pink miniskirt and a black t-shirt to go with it. "I never thought I would wear an outfit like this with this on," she said.

Peach pulled the t-shirt over her head and poked her arms through the correct sleeves, then pulling the shirt down to her stomach. She then grabbed the miniskirt and hung her legs over the side of the bed. Peach put her feet through the skirt and followed that with pulling up her legs to her waist and adjusted it accordingly. I think I'll keep these stockings on for now; they go with the skirt pretty well, she thought. "One last thing!" Peach exclaimed; she closed her eyes for a moment and prepared to change her diaper again. She opened her eyes a moment later and giggled, "there, now I'm dry and ready for action!"

Peach lifted herself off of the bed and wandered around the room for a bit; she then noticed the full-length mirror sitting right next to the room's closet door. Peach decided to check herself out in the new outfit that she had pick for herself; it looked good. Peach turned her attention down to her waist level and noticed that her diaper was slightly peeking out from underneath her new skirt; she couldn't help but blush. "this feels so naughty," Peach said "but I kinda like the look of this...maybe losing control of my bladder for a while came with some upsides." Peach then said to herself quietly, "I need to thank Rosalina the next time I see her, she was totally right about being diapered."

Just then, familiar voice filled Peach's ears; "but Peach, you've already thanked me ^_^"
1522222222222112122112111.title: Several hours later...

15222222222221121221121111.content:
Peach fell silent; she was not expecting a reply to her comment. She turned away from the mirror in order to look around the expansive room, she found nothing out of order. "That was weird, her voice sounded so clear..." Peach said; she eventually decided that it was nothing to be concerned about and again focused on other matters. Peach walked over to the bed, she closed up the suitcase that was laying on it "I'll put this in the closet for now," she said. Peach carried the suitcase across the room to the closet door; she set it down next to the door so that she could open it. Peach opened the door and walked into the dark wardrobe closet, and she blindly felt around the inside of the room for a light switch. After a bit of searching, she finally came across the switch and turned it on. The interior of the closet was bathed in light; Peach turned away from the wall and walked right into something, or rather, someone. "Hi, Peach!"

Peach was startled by the greeting and fell to the ground, landing on her backside. She looked up and saw Rosalina, who was looking back at her with a smile on her face. "Rosalina! geez, don't scare me like that; I almost had a heart attack!" Peach said, now short of breath. Rosalina laughed, "sorry, Peach" she said; "I just wanted to mess with you a little." She offered her hand to Peach and lifted her up from the ground. "Thanks," Peach said, "but why are you here, anyway? I wasn't expecting anyone else to be here." Rosalina replied "well, Peach; remember how I told you earlier that I had an event planned for later today?", Peach nodded in understanding. "This is the event; the weekend trip, Toadsworth planned it all after our little discussion the other day." "So...you're spending the weekend here?" Peach asked. "Ya, Toadsworth invited us to spend time with you; he thought it would help you adjust better with some friends here."

Peach's face had a confused look on it, "us? did someone else come with you?" Rosalina didn't so much reply to Peach's questions, but call out to someone else "you can come out now!" Peach looked past Rosalina to see another familiar face; the yellow dress and chestnut hair were all the visual clues that she needed, "Daisy!" Peach exclaimed. Daisy smiled back at Peach, replying with a wave and a "Yo!"
15222222222221121221121111.title: Rosalina's back

152222222222211212211211111.content:
Daisy emerged from behind Rosalina and walked toward Peach. “It’s so great to see you, Daisy!” Peach exclaimed again; she wrapped her arms around her old friend. Daisy commented on Peach’s affection, “I wasn’t expecting such a big welcome,” Rosalina laughed. Peach let go of Daisy; “sorry, it’s just that we haven’t been together in ages; I got a little excited.” Daisy laughed, “don’t apologize; I missed you, too, Peach. It has to have been at least a couple of months, or so.” Daisy continued, “Rosalina told me about Toadsworth’s idea, and I couldn’t just say no to it.” Peach smiled; her little holiday promised to be even better now.

Daisy leaned in closer to Peach; she had a smirk on her face, “so...” Peach was confused: “so...what...?” she replied. Daisy continued to smirk, “Rosalina tells me that you’re part of a little experiment of her’s?” Peach’s face turned red, she replied “well...yes, I am. It’s a bit embarrassing, I know.” Daisy’s tone became more comforting, “relax, Peach; it’s not a big deal. It’s not like I haven’t seen you wear a diaper before.” Rosalina queried about Daisy’s last comment: “you mean you have?” she asked. “Oh, ya” Daisy told Rosalina, “Peach and I have known each other since we were five years old; I already knew about her potty-training dilemmas from when we were kids.” Rosalina nodded, she expressed a look of understanding.

Peach entered the conversation again, “so, Rosalina, did you also tell her about yourself already?” “Well, Daisy sort of discovered in another way” Rosalina giggled. “Ya, let’s just say she forgot to make a ‘pit stop’ before picking me up,” Daisy chimed in. “Rosie here had a little accident, and that’s how I figured it out.” Daisy continued on: “I think the best part was that she did it on purpose, but she didn’t realize that I didn’t know about her diaper yet, and her face just went bright pink. She was totally defending it and saying she drank too much tea this morning; I couldn’t stop laughing!”

Peach whispered to Daisy “umm...I don’t think Rosalina liked your story too much.” They both looked to Rosalina, she was still smiling, but she had a bit of a fire in her eye. “I’m sorry, Rosalina!” Daisy exclaimed, “I-I-I- didn’t mean anything by it, it was just – I thought it was a cute way of you ‘telling’ me...don’t kill me!” Rosalina spoke in a surprisingly calm voice: “oh, I’m not mad, Daisy.” *Daisy let out a sigh of relief* “In hindsight, it was pretty funny; I was going to tell you about my being diapered, but I needed to pee so badly when I got to your place that it completely slipped my mind.” The three women laughed.

Rosalina ended her laughter, “although, that story got me thinking,” she announced to the others. “Peach and myself get to enjoy these diapers all weekend, my thought was that you *she pointed at Daisy* should get to join in our fun!” Daisy’s expression became a little more serious, “I think I see where this is going...” she muttered.
152222222222211212211211111.title: Daisy joins the fun

1522222222222112122112111111.content:
Daisy laughed nervously, “c’mon, Rosalina; I thought we had made up.” Rosalina replied “oh, I’m over that little thing, but I just thought you’d – oh, I don’t know – want to have a little extra ‘padding’ for the weekend?” This proposition got Peach excited “I didn’t even think of that! Oh, Daisy, you’ll love it!” Daisy looked at the eager Peach, she then peered back at Rosalina; her seemingly sweet smile was concealing a very devilish woman. Daisy sighed and said, “you know what, sure. I’m game.” Rosalina grinned, she then said “I had a feeling you’d say yes.” “Now we’re even, right?” Daisy commented. What she received as a response was Rosalina’s tongue poking out from her smiling visage.

Rosalina shut her eyes and took a second to focus. Daisy and Peach watched her make strange little motions with her hands, they were completely baffled. “Umm, Rosalina; aren’t you going to diaper Daisy now?” Peach asked. Rosalina’s hands stopped and she opened her eyes, “I’m done,” she answered. Daisy was a little surprised, “you’re done? That’s absurd; you were only busy for a second.” “Oh, I’m done, Daisy; see for yourself.”

Daisy scoffed, “I’m not buying it,” she started patting around her waist and backside. Daisy looked shocked; she felt a lot more bulk around her dress than she had remembered: “how in the...”. Daisy bent over and grabbed the bottom part of her dress and lifted it right up to see what was going on; sure enough, her panties had been replaced with a big, puffy diaper. “Told you,” Rosalina commented; Daisy blushed, “you got me there.” Peach moved in between and Daisy and Rosalina, she crouched down and just looked at Daisy’s exposed diaper, she giggled. “What?” Daisy asked; “you look cute with your big diaper on,” Peach replied.

“She’s right, Daisy; it fits you to a tee,” Rosalina said. Daisy’s response was replaced by a fit of giggling: “*giggle* stop it! You’re so bad!” What she was referring to was Peach, who was now feeling all around Daisy’s midsection, patting her diaper in a playful manner. Rosalina started laughing again, “well, at least if she makes you laugh too hard, you won’t need new panties!” Daisy attempted to carry on conversation with Rosalina, despite Peach’s poking and prodding:
“That reminds me, I think it’s about time you and I ‘dress down’ a little; it’s kind of hot in here.”
- *it looks so big and comfy!*
“Good point, Daisy; I wouldn’t mind putting on some lighter clothes.”
- *do you like it when I pat your butt like this?”
“Peach, could you come out from under my skirt now? We want to get changed.”

Peach emerged from underneath the yellow dress; her blonde hair tickled Daisy’s legs as she came up, which caused her to continue laughing. “I hope you had your fun, Peach,” Daisy said, “’cuz I’m gonna give you a headstart before I get some payback.” Peach replied, “I’ll head downstairs and look for some snacks or something; I’ll see you both down there in a few minutes?” Rosalina and Daisy both nodded. Peach turned to exit the closet; as she opened the door and stepped out she felt someone’s hand flipping up her skirt, patting her butt. She heard Daisy’s voice from behind “you’ve got five seconds, after that I’m gonna tickle you nonstop until I feel a wet diaper under your little skirt!” Peach took no time as she bolted out of the room, leaving Daisy and Rosalina to their own devices.
1522222222222112122112111111.title: Daisy gets diapered

15222222222221121221121111111.content:
After Peach had left the room, Rosalina and Daisy emerged from the closet to re-enter the large bedroom. Daisy looked around the expanse of the room, she appeared puzzled. “So...where did our luggage end up?” she asked Rosalina. “I think...they ended up under Peach’s bed?” Rosalina responded; “I’ll check,” Daisy said.” She began walking towards the bed, but within the first couple of steps Daisy noticed something was different; “you’re waddling a bit,” she heard Rosalina say. Daisy felt a little embarrassed, she replied “I didn’t really notice that you made these so thick.” Rosalina smiled and commented “ya, I went a little overboard in that department; I tested the spell on myself first, and I live alone –except for my Lumas – so I wanted something extra absorbent while I was in the lab.”
Daisy approached the bed. She knelt down and reached underneath, almost immediately her hand bumped into a large obstruction; Daisy grasped the object and pulled it into her view. “This one’s yours,” she said, moving it aside so she could reach under the bed a second time; she emerged once again with yet another suitcase: “found mine!”The two opened up their individual bags and began rummaging for some clothes.

“I’ve found that loose-fitting clothes are great to wear over your diaper, like a skirt or pants with an elastic waist,” Rosalina said to Daisy, who was now sitting on the bed next to her bag. “Thanks, but I’ve got something in mind,” Daisy replied. She searched for a bit, eventually finding a pair of orange board shorts, and a yellow tank top to go with it. Daisy closed up bag and placed on the floor near a nightstand, she looked up and saw that Rosalina had already stripped down; she was facing the other direction. Daisy noticed Rosalina’s wet diaper; a smile developed on her face, but she made every attempt not to laugh as to not further irritate Rosalina (once was enough today). Daisy decided to ignore it and reached behind her head to unzip her dress.

The zipper ran down to her lower back, after that Daisy pulled her arms out of the sleeves and let the torso of the dress fall to her waist. She began to pull the dress down past her waist; the diaper’s extra bulk required a little more effort, but she was able to force the skirt of the dress down far enough that she could step out of it. The now diaper-clad princess grabbed the tank top and put it on; it stretched down to her waistline. Daisy motioned to grab the shorts, but something caused her to hesitate. She stood in place for a minute, just looking at and feeling her new underwear. It’s so thick, but it feels almost...cloud-like, she thought.

Daisy ran both of her hands down the back of the diaper, her hands felt as if they were partially sinking into the material; it was kind of like a pillow. Daisy giggled quietly: I think I can see why Rosalina and Peach like wearing these, she thought. She was snapped out of her trance by Rosalina’s voice, “have you gotten used to it a little more?” Daisy opened her eyes to see Rosalina in front of her; she was now dressed in an ice blue shirt and a dark blue, knee-length skirt. She blushed, “I guess I have...hehe”. Rosalina’s face brightened, “it just takes a little time, but you’ll get comfortable soon enough.” “I think you’re right, Rosie, although I’m not so sure about my bathroom situation just yet.” They both looked at each other and burst out laughing.

Daisy calmed down again and asked Rosalina something else; “on that topic though, you mentioned that you tested this spell you’re trying on Peach right now on yourself first, right?” Rosalina nodded, “yes, that’s right”. Daisy continued, “I’m guessing it’s passed by now, but how come you’re still wearing – and using – your diaper?” Rosalina’s expression remained the same, “no particular reason; I just really like wearing them,” she confessed. Daisy nodded in understanding; she sat back down on the bed and put her shorts on. She stood again to pull them up over her diaper, “so what made you like them so much?” Daisy asked Rosalina.

Rosalina pondered for a moment, “well, I guess it was mostly that I had gotten so used to them over the first couple of weeks, that when the spell wore off I just...didn’t want to go back to panties right away.” She continued “I think the turning point was the first morning after the spell wore off. I was waking up for the day, but when I became conscious I had realized that my bladder felt like a brick. I was up watching movies late the night before and went through a lot of soda.” Daisy interjected for a bit, “so you woke up and realized that you had your bladder control back, then what?” Rosalina continued: “I just laid there in bed for a moment; I had to pee really badly, but the bathroom was down the hall and I didn’t think I was going to get there in time. It was at that point I thought, ‘is it that bad if I...just stay diapered for a while?’”

Daisy chuckled, she knew what Rosalina was going to say next “Oh my god, you so didn’t!” she exclaimed. Rosalina’s cheeks flushed and she finished “yep; I just relaxed a bit and...went.” Daisy laughed a little harder now, she responded “you’re so bad! You peed yourself anyway?” Rosalina replied “that wasn’t the only thing though, it was the first time I actually had feeling when I peed in my diaper. The feeling of my bladder emptying was so nice, and I felt this warm spot grow underneath my clothes while I stayed dry outside. It was wonderful...”

Rosalina had begun envisioning her experience; before she drifted off into another daydream she opened her eyes and looked at Daisy, who looked a little surprised by her reasoning. “Sorry, I drifted off a bit...I’m weird, aren’t I?” Daisy shook her head, “not really; well, I mean, a bit. There’s nothing wrong with that though.” Rosalina mirrored the look of surprise that Daisy had a moment before. She responded: “you don’t think that’s strange at all?” Daisy’s next comment comforted Rosalina, “I grew up with Peach; she had a traumatic experience as a kid yes, but she genuinely loved wearing diapers. This isn’t that different.”

Rosalina’s smile became very warm “thank you, I’m glad to hear that” she said to Daisy. “Now come on,” Daisy answered “Peach is probably getting a bit lonely, why don’t we head downstairs and start having some fun?” “Sounds like a great idea, Daisy” Rosalina said.
15222222222221121221121111111.title: Daisy and Rosalina get dressed

choices: The sushi doesn't set well with Peach
152222222222211212211211111111.content:
Daisy and Rosalina exited the bedroom and made their way downstairs to where Peach was. Nothing was said, but the sound of diapers crinkling filled their ears while they walked down the staircase. Daisy was still a little embarrassed by the very audible noise coming from underneath her clothes, but she did her best to mask it. After all, it wasn’t that big of a deal – considering whom she was with.

Rosalina made it to the foot of the stairs a little before Daisy did; “Peach, are you still down here?” she called from the stairs. They both heard a reply from Peach’s voice immediately; “just head to the kitchen!” she replied. Rosalina and Daisy wandered towards the kitchen; they saw Peach looking into the refrigerator, “sorry about the wait, I’m still hunting around for a suitable snack for us.” “Don’t worry; I’m not picky, just so long as it doesn’t contain mushrooms.” Daisy commented; Rosalina laughed.

Not soon after Daisy’s comment, Peach emerged with a large box; she used her foot to push the door to the fridge so that it would close itself. The other two girls were curious as to what the contents of this box were. “So what did you find, exactly?” asked Rosalina. Peach grinned, “it’s chock-full of sushi! I haven’t had this stuff in ages!” Peach placed the box on the island centered in the kitchen and removed the top; sure enough, the box contained several dozen rolls of sushi.

Peach shifted her view towards Daisy and Rosalina. “Well, don’t just stand there, you two; come have some!” The others didn’t hesitate; the three girls all pulled up a seat around the island and began to consume the contents of the sushi box.
152222222222211212211211111111.title: Rosalina and Daisy head downstairs

1522222222222112122112111111111.content:
Peach, Daisy, and Rosalina continued to enjoy the sushi. In what seemed a matter of minutes, the box was empty. “You know, I don’t think I’ve ever had sushi before; it was really good.” Rosalina commented. Peach replied “I think you’re the first person I’ve known who liked it after eating it for the first time.”

Rosalina glanced back at Peach, she appeared confused; “why do you say that?” she asked. “Well...you do know the main ingredients of sushi, right?” Peach queried. “Um...no?” Rosalina replied; Daisy began to laugh. Rosalina looked over at Daisy and questioned her laughter “what are you laughing about?” Daisy stopped laughing for a moment to speak “Raw fish! You just ate raw fish!” Rosalina’s expression changed very quickly.

Peach immediately recognized Rosalina’s reception of this new information. “Oh, you’re not allergic or anything, are you?” she said in an apologetic tone. Rosalina held up her hands and shook her head “no, not at all! I was just surprised, that’s all.” Peach and Daisy sighed in relief in tandem; “you scared me there for a second; with that look on your face, I thought you were about to become violently ill,” said Peach. Rosalina’s face became cheerful again, “think nothing of it, and besides that I’m normally quite healthy. I very rarely become sick.”

Daisy replied to Rosalina’s last comment, “sounds like you have a strong immune system; I think I come down with something every couple of months.” Peach’s worry now focused itself on Daisy “that sounds terrible!” she said. “It’s not as bad as it sounds, Peach,” said Daisy; “nine times out of ten it’s something minor; a cold or a headache, things like that. I’ve actually been in pretty good shape for about four months, now that you mention it.” Peach replied, “that’s good to hear; if I had to guess I’m probably about average in terms of how often I get something. It’s never more than a few times a year, at most.”

Rosalina re-entered the conversation, “well, I can say that one of the worst things I’ve had happened only a couple of weeks ago.” Peach and Daisy focused back on the third princess; “how bad are we talking?” Peach asked. “Horrible, I think I was bed-ridden for a couple of days,” Rosalina said. “What exactly was it?” Daisy wondered, “a virus of some kind?” Rosalina shrugged, “perhaps, I’m not too sure what it was, now that I think about it.” She continued, “what I can tell you about is how it happened...if you’re interested.”
1522222222222112122112111111111.title: Discussions break out

choices: Peach and Daisy have questions about Rosalina's story
The three decide to do something else
15222222222221121221121111111111.content:
Peach was the first to respond to Rosalina’s offer “sure, it sounds like whatever you had was pretty unique.” Daisy also voiced her thoughts, “why not? Maybe we can figure it what this ‘mystery illness’ was in the process!” Rosalina smiled, “thanks. I guess I’ll start on the day that it happened.” She tilted her head up for a moment, trying to focus on that day a few weeks before...

It was early in the afternoon, and I was working in my lab trying to make more progress on this bladder-numbing spell – the one I tested on myself, and what Peach is currently testing. I felt strange all morning, but up until that point I had been alright; I figured it was just fatigue. Something felt ‘off’ with me, so by the time I broke for lunch I decided it might be a good idea to break for the day, just to play it safe. I cleaned up my workspace, left the lab, and began walking down the hall.

As I was making my way through the hallway, I stopped dead in my tracks and grabbed my stomach. A sharp pain enveloped my midsection, and it caused me to drop to my knees right in the middle of the hall...Rosalina paused for a moment. “Sorry, I’m still pretty embarrassed about what happened next,” she apologized. “Take your time,” Peach said reassuringly. Rosalina took a deep breath, then exhaled; she continued where she had left off.

The pain was almost unbearable; I also began to shiver violently. I tried to stand up, but I suddenly felt a lot of pressure in my intestines. I knew exactly what was going to happen, but the pain was so much that I lost control of my sphincter, and I...Rosalina’s face flushed...messed myself. If I wasn’t still wearing my diaper from my previous experiment, I think I would have been scarred for life.

Anyway, after my little ‘accident’, I gathered the strength to stand up. Through the pain – and a full diaper – I began shuffling towards my bedroom; I was maybe a few doors away, but it seemed like a mile at the time. I think all the stress on my body put some unwanted pressure on my bladder, too. I vividly recall the diaper under my skirt becoming very warm and wet. Daisy interrupted Rosalina’s story for a bit, “my God; you must have been dying at that point!” Rosalina smiled, her face still very flushed “yes, I believe at the time, all I could think about was ‘I am so glad I kept diapering myself after that experiment’.”

Peach decided this was the best time to interject; “not to stray off-topic, but how was...you know...filling your diaper?” Rosalina replied “let me put it this way; I wet my diaper because I like to, but I still use the toilet for...other times.” Peach’s face also became red, “well, I think I can relate from experience. A wet diaper’s easier to manage.” Rosalina laughed a little, and then continued on.

Well, I finally managed to reach my bedroom door. I opened it and collapsed just inside my room; it took every ounce of willpower left in me just to crawl over to the bed and pull myself up onto it. Once on the bed, I sat up and used my magic to prepare for the next little while. I started by changing my diaper, since I wasn’t keen on sitting in what I just did for the whole day.

Next, I changed out of my dress into some pyjamas. They were these light blue, fuzzy footy pyjamas; I look like such a little kid in them, but it’s so comfortable! Next, I materialized a couple bottles of water on the adjacent nightstand, and a bucket by the bedside, just in case. I slipped under the blanket and was about to fall asleep, but I remembered one last thing. Considering the violent cold and abdominal pain that I was experiencing – and my ‘accident’ in the hall – I wasn’t expecting to get out of bed anytime soon. With that, I decided to make my diaper thicker; a lot thicker. I think it was about an inch and a half thick normally, I made it around three inches thick for that day.

I slept for what seems like an eternity. By the time I woke up, it was already early in the evening. I still felt cold, despite being nestled under my blanket for quite some time, and the stomach pain didn’t quit. I must have wet the bed while I slept; I felt wet, but there was so much padding that I was still dry. On that note, I took time to notice how comfy this extra thick diaper under my fuzzy pyjamas really was. Despite how miserable I felt, I’ve never been more comfortable!

Moving on; I sat up for a bit, guzzled back some water, and tried to go back to sleep. Before I could doze off again, I fidgeted a little; I had to pee again. I had no intentions of getting out of bed, so I just relaxed and peed myself; I couldn’t stop giggling during it. I quickly patted myself down to check my diaper (still dry), and drifted off into sleep not long after.

I awoke again early in the morning; I still felt really sick, but it was definitely much better than last night. My stomach pain was a little weaker than before, but still present, and I still felt a bit chilly for most of the day. I reached down to feel my diaper, the groin of my pyjamas were kind of damp; not really wet, but I was probably sweating a lot overnight, and I had definitely wet my diaper a few times. Regardless, I figured it would be nice to get up and take a bath.

I hadn’t actually walked in a diaper that thick before, but it was awkward, I was waddling really badly over to the bathroom in my room. After a bath, I changed into a fresh diaper and put my pyjamas back on. I had some on my unexpected day off; I spent the day relaxing in bed, watching movies mostly, but I also spent some time playing my DS. I think I drained a few hours into my file on Pokemon Pearl, I forgot how addicting those games can be. Anyway, by the next morning I was nearly back to 100 percent; by that point I had eased back into my lab work. It wasn’t a full day, I didn’t want to overexert myself...well, that and I had trouble putting down my DS from the day before!
15222222222221121221121111111111.title: Rosalina reminisces about her illness

152222222222211212211211111111111.content:
Rosalina was the first to speak after she had finished; “that’s the story, more or less. Any ideas on what my illness might have been?” Peach and Daisy looked at each other, searching for any sort of answer. Peach began naming off traits that Rosalina described, “so, you had sharp pains in your stomach, violent shivering, excessive sweating overnight, and...mild incontinence.” Once Peach finished, Daisy added her thoughts: “it sounds like you may have had a particularly bad case of some stomach virus, but I can’t think of any stomach viruses that make you lose control of your bladder or bowels.”

“Well, I think filling my diaper in the hallway was a result of the intense pain I was in,” Rosalina commented. “You said that you wet your bed several times, do you think that was from this virus?” Peach asked. “Perhaps, I tend to go pee before I fall asleep or just after I wake up, so I was a little surprised when I realized that I was wetting in my sleep,” Rosalina replied. “I can’t really think of anything else, Rosalina,” said Peach; “a weird strain of stomach virus is probably our best guess.” Daisy nodded in agreement; she then turned her focus on Rosalina and asked “there’s just one thing I need to know.” “What is it, Daisy?” Rosalina questioned. “Well, it’s kinda silly, but...you can make your diaper thicker on a whim?”

Rosalina was caught off-guard somewhat by Daisy’s question, to which she smiled and then answered “yes, it’s a simple matter, really; I can give each of us a little extra ‘padding’ right now, if you like.” Peach and Daisy looked at each other again, from Rosalina’s point of view it appeared that they were seriously considering it. Peach and Daisy both nodded in agreement, then turned to Rosalina and replied...
152222222222211212211211111111111.title: Peach and Daisy have questions about Rosalina...

choices: Daisy needs to use the bathroom
1522222222222112122112111111111111.content:
“Sure!” Peach and Daisy said in unison. Rosalina laughed at their tandem response, “I didn’t think my offer would be accepted so easily.” Daisy explained her reasoning “well, I figured that if I’m going to wear diapers all weekend, I might as well experiment a little.” Rosalina’s expression changed upon hearing Daisy’s answer; “I had a feeling you would jump at the chance, you seemed to really enjoy that extra padding when we were changing,” she said in a rather sly tone. Daisy shifted her head downward; Rosalina was right on the money, but she was too embarrassed to admit it. After all, Daisy was very much a tomboy, and news of this exposed some dormant femininity to her friends.

“Daisy, I’ve never seen this side to you before; it’s so adorable!” Peach giggled. Daisy raised her head, her face still red; “the one time I act like a girl,” she chuckled. After everyone calmed down again, Rosalina made a motion with her hands; she put her hands back down in her lap a few seconds later. “Umm...don’t you have to cast a spell or something, Rosalina?” Peach asked, “I figured that you would need to chant verses, or use a wand; something.” “That was it, the change should have happened already,” Rosalina responded. “Are you sure it worked? Everything feels the same as before,” Peach said. “Okay, I’ll show you, Peach. Would you mind standing up for a second?”

Peach was sceptical...what exactly does standing up accomplish... she thought. She got out of her seat and stood up at the island; Rosalina waved her hand a little, she wanted Peach to back up some more, probably for a better view. “Thanks Peach, that’s the only confirmation I needed.” Peach had no idea what Rosalina meant by ‘confirmation’. She turned to Daisy, who was keeping a hand over part of her face as though she was trying to hide it. Peach, now a little irritated, asked her friends in a very stern manner “just tell me if it worked! And why are you acting so strange? Are you laughing at me?!”

Daisy answered in as calm of a tone as she could, “oh, it worked Peach, unless your skirt is shorter than I thought it was.” “My skirt? What are you-“ then it dawned on Peach. She moved her hand along the pink skirt, and continued with her hand past her skirt to place her hand on her diaper. Peach looked down at her waist, and to her shock, a significant part of her diaper was in full view for her friends to see. “Oh my God!” she cried, now trying to pull her skirt down over her exposed ‘panties’; “it was fully covered just a second ago!”

The others tried to comfort Peach in light of her embarrassing discovery;
(Rosalina) “It’s not that bad, Peach; it’s not like we didn’t know about it.”
(Daisy) “Ya, c’mon, Peach; don’t get so worked up over it.”
(Rosalina) “Besides, isn’t that extra-thick diaper much more comfortable?”
(Daisy) “I think the look fits you, girl. You just look so cute, with your diaper peeking out like that!”

Peach sighed, brushed off her skirt, and let it sit in place; with nearly half of her diaper showing. “You guys are right, it looks fine like this. And it is more comfortable, Rosalina!” She glanced at the other two girls, “on that note, how do you two like all of this extra ‘padding’ between your legs?” “It feels like the one I had while I was sick,” Rosalina answered. “I love it. The extra cushion on my butt feels so nice!” Daisy replied, sporting a big grin on her bright red face.

Peach giggled to herself, “I’m glad; it was silly of me to freak out so much.” “It’s perfectly fine, Peach,” Rosalina replied; “and besides, things could be worse.” “That’s right, I mean...it’s not like you wet yourself with it in full view of us,” Daisy said, hoping to console Peach’s worries. Peach went quiet for a moment, and leaned back on the counter behind her. Her cheeks slowly turned pink again, “umm...now that you mention it, Daisy.”

Daisy was quick to answer Peach’s comment, “did you?” Peach nodded, “right now, I just noticed as you were speaking; it just sort of...happened.” She crossed her legs together, almost in a vain attempt to hold it in; she put a hand on her diaper and felt the warm liquid build up and splash around, she felt her whole body quiver from the sensation. When the stream ended, Peach froze momentarily, a mischievous smirk grew on her face; “ah, now I feel better!” “Well, that was kind of anti-climactic,” Daisy commented; she had envisioned that Peach would react differently after wetting her pants.

Rosalina was a bit surprised herself, “I’m impressed that you handled it so well, Peach!” Peach explained herself, “to be honest, something has been nagging me for a little while now; I figured that I needed to go, but since I can’t feel when my bladder’s full I just expected it to happen sooner or later. That was part of the reason I was a little tense before.” Rosalina could relate to Peach’s situation; “I know what you mean; when I was testing on myself, I always found myself wanting to pee so I wouldn’t have to worry about it. You don’t feel anything up until your diaper starts getting wet, and when it happens it can really catch you off-guard.”

Daisy added to the conversation, “this whole spell business reminds me of Peach when we were little. Before she was potty-trained, Peach would dance around frantically whenever she needed to go.” Peach laughed, “I remember doing that all the time.” Daisy laughed a bit, then continued; “anyway, I remember asking things like ‘do you have use the toilet?’ and she would keep refusing, ‘I can’t!” she would reply. It would go on until she eventually wet or messed in her diaper, and she would carry on as normal afterwards.” “At least by that point, I was able to change myself; it was always a little tedious to hunt down a servant every time I had an accident,” Peach said.

“I know your reasons were psychological, but that’s kind of adorable, Peach,” Rosalina added. “She’d do the same thing at night, just toss and turn in her sleep until she wet the bed,” Daisy recalled. “Eventually, I think I convinced her to drink more before going to sleep so that she would pee beforehand; it ended up working very well.” Peach replied, “it did help me fall asleep more easily, but I don’t think it stopped me from having accidents in bed.” Everyone laughed at Peach’s last comment; not at the fact that her childhood mishaps were amusing, but rather that she was so comfortable with being open about it.

Daisy stretched in her chair, her back was stiff from sitting in the same chair for so long. “Do you mind if we move to another room? Preferably with a couch or something?” Daisy asked. Peach smiled and replied, “I don’t see why not; I wouldn’t mind relaxing in a sofa, myself. On that note, I really want to feel what it’s like to sit on something soft with a few extra inches of ‘padding’!”

The diapers are just thin enough to enable walking.
