Let's go all out!" "Okay then!" Rosalina said. An aura wrapped around them, and
15222222222221121221121111111111111.title: Everyone heads to the den

choices: Rosalina and Daisy team up on Peach
15222222222221121221121111111111112.content:
Peach led the way as the three girls left the kitchen. Not long after, they entered a reasonably-sized room. “This should be a nice change,” Peach commented, “it started out as a sitting area, but over my past few visits I’ve changed it into more of a home entertainment room.” The others looked around the contents a room; it contained a pair of large sofas, complemented by a small coffee table with a few bean bag chairs positioned around it. Mounted on the back wall of the room was a large, flat-screen TV; just beneath it sat a cabinet containing a sound system, various media players, and a few video game consoles.

“Nice setup, Peach” Daisy said; Peach laughed “thanks, this is the first time I’ve been at this house since I completely finished setting things up.” Daisy made her way over to the coffee table and nestled herself in the nearest bean bag chair. She let her body sink into it, “mmm...I don’t think I’ll be getting out of this for a while.” Peach and Rosalina joined her at the coffee table and pulled up two more of the bean bags; Rosalina expressed a similar look of comfort as she fell back into her seat. “I can’t remember the last time I sat in one of these things; it’s as comfy as my bed,” Rosalina said.

Peach smiled, “I knew these would be a good fit for the room.” Peach flopped into the bean bag chair, her skirt flipped up a little as she sank into her seat. Rosalina giggled, “not too wary of your skirt anymore, Peach?” Rosalina was referring to Peach’s diaper bulging between her legs, her skirt failing to cover much of it at all. Peach shrugged and replied, “I’m not too concerned; you two know what’s under my skirt, anyway.” Peach continued, “besides, Rosie, I can see up your skirt from here.” Rosalina giggled again, “you’re such a perv!”

Peach glanced over at a laughing Daisy, “it’s all in good fun, like how cute Daisy’s bum looks with that extra bulk pressing up against her shorts!” Daisy buried her hands in her groin area, “I didn’t think it showed that much,” she uttered amidst her laughter. “You’re right, Peach; it really suits Daisy well,” Rosalina commented, “a nice big diaper can make any girl look cuter!” “Oh man, you guys are being so weird, but in a good way,” Daisy commented; she was still giggling from the others’ remarks.

Daisy’s laughter subsided; when she stopped, Peach and Rosalina noticed that her hands remained clutching her crotch as her legs squirmed around slightly. “Are you feeling okay, Daisy? You look like you’re sick or something,” Peach asked. Daisy looked up again, “oh, it’s nothing; it’s just that laughing fit reminded me...” “Remind you of what?” Rosalina asked. Daisy staggered her response, “I just...I kinda...really need to-““You have to pee?” Rosalina interjected. Daisy nodded; “badly,” she replied sheepishly.

“Is that all?” said Peach, “don’t be shy, just go in your diaper!” Daisy replied, “it’s just that – I haven’t voluntarily wet myself before; it’s a little awkward, you know?” Peach understood somewhat, but wasn’t really seeing the problem. “How bad do you need to go?” Rosalina asked Daisy. “Well, I think if I move too suddenly it’s going to start coming out,” she chuckled; Daisy stopped herself before long and returned focus towards holding her bladder. Rosalina sighed, “well, not much we can do about that; you’re a moment away from wetting yourself.”

Rosalina shuffled over to the ailing Daisy; Peach moved closer as well, just to observe. Rosalina gently rubbed Daisy’s back, “it’s alright, Daisy; just relax.” Daisy’s body began to calm down, the pressure on her bladder felt like it was at critical mass; “now what?” Rosalina spoke in a soothing tone, “we’re going to make this as comfortable for you as possible. Relax and just think about something else; let nature take its course.”

Daisy closed her eyes and exhaled, she let her mind wander as Rosalina instructed. As her body (and her bladder) relaxed, she felt a trickle leak out; Daisy gasped as the trickle turned into a steady stream. Daisy’s entire body quivered, she calmly moved a hand over her pelvis and gently pushed it into the soft material of her diaper. She felt a growing heat under her shorts, and the sensation ran up her arm and across her body; deep down, Daisy felt that she was enjoying it. The whole ordeal felt like an eternity to Daisy, but soon enough it ended.

Daisy opened her eyes and saw Peach and Rosalina smiling at her; she smiled back “I think I’m done now.” “How are you feeling?” Rosalina asked. “Much better,” Daisy replied; “I’m not sure if it was the need to pee or wetting my diaper, but it felt pretty good.” Daisy was about to continue, but she felt something tugging on her clothes; she glanced over at Peach, who was in the midst of pulling down her shorts. “And what are you up to?” she said, Daisy was being inquisitive but at the same time she was in a playful mood. Peach responded by placing her hand on Daisy’s wet diaper; “it’s still warm,” she giggled.
15222222222221121221121111111111112.title: Daisy needs to use the bathroom

152222222222211212211211111111111121.content:
Peach continued to poke and prod at her friend’s wet diaper. “Quit it, Peach,” Daisy said, her smiling face a bright red hue; “this is embarrassing!” Peach didn’t pay much attention to Daisy’s request; “it was just a little accident, Daisy! You don’t seem too upset about it,” she gleefully responded. Daisy tried to speak in a serious manner, but she found it difficult thanks to Peach’s ticklish fondling; “that doesn’t mean *giggle* you can pull down *giggle* my pants!” Her laughter was infectious, now Rosalina was having a laugh at Daisy’s expense alongside Peach. “Sorry, Daisy; seeing you and Peach fool around like this is really sweet,” Rosalina said. “You two must be very close.”

Peach agreed, “we’ve known each other since we were little kids; I feel like we’re sisters.” Daisy agreed as well, although only with a nod of her head (Peach wasn’t letting up). Peach finally ended her assault on Daisy’s abdomen; Daisy was panting a little bit, she felt very relieved. “I think I found something out about you, Daisy,” Peach said as she returned to her spot. “Oh?” Daisy wondered, “and what might that be?” A darker-looking smile enveloped Peach’s face, “you were embarrassed because you’ve been wearing a diaper for less than a couple of hours...and you already like it so much! The sporty tomboy showed her best friends firsthand that deep down she loves waddling around with a soft, bulky diaper between her legs.”

Daisy was speechless for a moment, “I...well...that is to say-“ Peach butted in again, “by the look of things, it looked like you really enjoyed peeing yourself a little while ago!” Daisy didn’t reply right away; she shifted in her seat and pulled her shorts up, concealing her diaper once more. “Well, am I wrong?” Peach queried. Daisy looked her in the eye and shrugged, “I guess I do – who knows, maybe I’m more into it than both you and Rosie over here.”

She continued, “you got me, Peach; truth is, I think I liked being diapered not soon after Rosalina put me in one. I liked the initial feel of it under my dress; I like how comfy it is to walk around in and sit on; I...loved the sensation all over my body when I wet myself. I love every moment of it, just like the two of you do!” “I think we’ve officially begun bonding,” Rosalina commented; “I’m glad that you’re happy, Daisy, I really am.” Daisy smiled warmly, “thanks,” she replied.

Peach crawled across the floor to Daisy’s seat again, Daisy turned back to be greeted by Peach’s arms around her shoulders. “Aren’t you affectionate today?” Daisy said. “It’s just that – I’m so happy that we’ve become this close over the years!” Peach said, she could feel a tear roll down her cheek. Peach looked up at Daisy, who wiped the tear from her cheek; Daisy smiled “I am too, you’re like a sister to me; we should be able to do anything together. Almost makes me regret what I’m about to do next.” Peach was confused, “what are you going to do?” Daisy snickered, “payback, of course!”

There was hardly any time to react as Daisy fell back into her bean bag chair, with Peach tightly in her grasp. Daisy’s hands moved down Peach’s back, and to bottom of her skirt; her hands caressed and squeezed Peach’s bottom. “Daisy, *giggle* you’re touching my butt!” Peach cried. “It’s really soft down there,” Daisy replied; now she was having some fun much like Peach did a few moments before. “C’mon, Daisy, I was only messing around!” Peach said, laughing and struggling to escape her friend’s clutches.

“You’re just like a couple of kids, wrestling each other,” Rosalina commented, “although this is a bit more provocative.” Daisy continued her little game, despite Peach’s pleas. “Your diaper’s so thick, Peach,” Daisy lowered her hand and felt a warm, damp patch. She smiled and whispered into Peach’s ear; “has someone been having trouble with the potty? Naughty girl!” Peach gave up trying to get away, and she replied, “it’s too hard to use the potty! I’m just gonna go in my diaper like you two!” Daisy stuck her tongue out at Peach “just teasing you; you can go in your diaper as much as you want!”
152222222222211212211211111111111121.title: Daisy pulls Peach in closer

choices: The girls discuss what they like about being diapered
1522222222222112122112111111111111212.content:
Peach remained caught in Daisy’s grasp; humouring her friend, Peach stopped trying to free herself and let Daisy have her fun. She asked the chestnut-haired girl, “Daisy, can we stop yet? Maybe give Rosalina a turn or something?” Rosalina laughed in the background. Daisy grinned, “Okay, Peach; I would have stopped sooner, but poking and patting someone’s diaper gets kind of addicting.” Before she took her hands off of Peach’s backside, Daisy heard a familiar hissing noise.

The two looked at each other; it took Peach a second to notice, and when she did her face turned a bit red. “Umm...this is awkward,” Daisy commented, finally pulling her hands away from Peach’s diaper. Peach rolled off of Daisy; she sat up and gazed downward at her waist, quivering from the sensation. Daisy’s response was sincere “umm...sorry about that; I didn’t think you would have to go again that soon.” Peach shook her head, “it’s alright, Daisy; it caught me by surprise as much as you (she felt her freshly wet diaper). Funny, I thought my bladder would have been empty from before.”

“I think I can explain,” Rosalina chimed in. Peach and Daisy turned their attention towards her, Rosalina began to speak. “When I tested the spell on myself, the same thing happened to me – I peed more frequently than I do normally.” Peach worried over this news: “I’m not going to have permanent bladder problems, am I?” Rosalina smiled, “oh no, it’s nothing serious; from my experience, the first couple of days of the spell seem to act as a transition period. Your body isn’t used to not having any feeling down there, so the muscles are relaxed more often than they usually would be, causing your bladder to empty.”

“So it’s like an overactive bladder, then?” Daisy asked. Rosalina nodded, “exactly; over time her body will get used to it, but for now her bladder will relax without warning.” Peach sighed, “that’s a relief, for a moment I thought I was losing my bladder control permanently.” “Don’t worry, Peach, I wouldn’t test this on you – or anyone – without researching the side effects,” Rosalina reassured her. Peach smiled, “thanks for being honest,” Rosalina replied with a smile of her own. Peach asked Rosalina another question, “are there any other side effects I should know about?”

Rosalina mulled over the question, after a few seconds she responded “that should be the only one, but I’ll add that it’s just easier to let the spell run its course.” “Run its course?” Daisy repeated, “what do you mean by that?” Rosalina explained, “it just means that Peach shouldn’t worry too much about random accidents, and fighting it is very frustrating...believe me, I know. Over the first few days I can’t count how many times I tried to hold it in and make it to the bathroom, and always trying to guess when I had to pee just ended badly.”

Rosalina’s face flushed, she hadn’t intended to discuss her own mishaps with Peach and Daisy; she cleared her throat and continued. “Anyway, just don’t worry about it Peach; just act as if you were never potty-trained for the next few weeks.” Peach giggled, “at least I have some previous experience!” Everyone laughed.
1522222222222112122112111111111111212.title: Peach has an accident...again!

15222222222221121221121111111111112121.content:
The laughter died down, “such an odd thing to be joking about, when you think about it” Daisy commented. “Ya, but this is just the kind of weekend we’re in store for,” Peach replied. “Oh, there’s just one more thing, Peach” Rosalina interjected. “What’s that?” Peach wondered; Rosalina leaned in and spoke in a soft tone “you’re going to wet the bed...heavily...just a heads up.” Daisy heard the gist of Rosalina’s information, she started laughing again.

Peach giggled, “frankly, I would be surprised if I didn’t wet in my sleep during this whole experiment,” Rosalina laughed. Rosalina pulled her bean bag chair in right in between Peach and Daisy, and she nestled herself in its plush. “Well, Peach; one thing I liked to do at night was use a spell to make my diaper really thick – as thick as I made it when I was sick a few weeks ago,” Rosalina described to Peach. Both Peach and Daisy liked Rosalina’s solution, “that sounds really comfy!” they said in unison. “It is probably one of my favourite parts about wearing a diaper,” Rosalina added; “I still do it every night!”

“Aw, that just sounds adorable!” Peach said in a cutesy tone; “can we all do that tonight?” she asked – pleaded, actually. Rosalina giggled, “of course! it’s an easy spell, so I can show you both for when you want to do it on your own, too.” Daisy was intrigued by Rosalina’s offer, “so...how thick are we talking here?” she asked. “Um...I usually make my diaper about three inches thick, sometimes more,” Rosalina responded; Daisy was amazed, “sleeping in that must feel so nice!” Rosalina had a look of satisfaction in her eyes, “you don’t know the half of it, Daisy.”

Rosalina continued to describe her comfort: “That’s why I love being diapered; you experience things that you never get a chance to. Imagine lying in bed, and as you sink into the mattress you have this extra cushion pressing against your body. It crinkles loudly, and it feels like a big pillow. Sometimes, I like to wear my night diaper on during the day. My dress doesn’t fit too well over one that thick, so I just wear my feety pajamas or a t-shirt over them and just...waddle around in it.”

“So your favourite thing to do is make your diaper so thick that you have trouble walking properly?” Peach asked. Rosalina nodded, “mhmm...well, there’s one other part I love; it’s strange, but I think I enjoy wetting myself a little too much.” Peach laughed hysterically, “that’s so naughty! I think we need to show you how to take your diaper off once in a while, Rosie!” Rosalina’s face was turning redder, “I would more often, but they’re so comfy that I just don’t want to take them off, even to pee!” she said. Daisy interjected with a question to Rosalina; “let’s rephrase that question: when was the last time you used a toilet to go pee?”

Rosalina took a surprisingly long time to think about Daisy’s question, to which she finally replied “uh...does sitting on the toilet and going in my diaper count?” Daisy shook her head, “have you really gone that long without using the toilet?” “Well, yeah; it’s pretty easy to stay in diapers and not even consider something like that,” Rosalina replied. “It was the same for me when I was a kid,” Peach commented; “it’s not a bad thing, if you like doing it then just do it.” Daisy asked another question: “so, Rosalina; by diapering yourself indefinitely, doesn’t your bladder control suffer?”

Rosalina shook her head, “not really, no; I make sure that my bladder doesn’t get lazy. I just act as though I’m going to the bathroom like I normally would, but I replace the toilet with my diaper.” “Do you have to do anything special?” Peach asked. “No, just make sure that you’re not peeing frequently just for the sake of it; hold it in like you normally would. As I mentioned before, what I found helped me was simply sitting on the toilet and wetting myself; it keeps your body attentive, and you get used to the diaper at the same time.”

Rosalina paused for a second “...that being said...I wasn’t exactly ‘perfect’ before I started wearing them.” Peach and Daisy looked puzzled; “what do you mean?” Rosalina replied, “let’s just say that I’m (she blushes)...accident prone?”
15222222222221121221121111111111112121.title: A change of pace

152222222222211212211211111111111121212.content:
The others could tell Rosalina was pretty embarrassed about her little secret. They leaned closer to Rosalina to comfort her; Peach tried to console her “it’s okay, Rosalina, no one’s perfect.” Daisy also made an effort to comfort her “is it something medical? Either way, it’s totally understandable; can happen to anyone, Rosalina.” Peach and Daisy could see a smile underneath the hair that hung over Rosalina’s face, “I appreciate your help.” Rosalina sat upright “it’s really nothing serious, my bladder is just a little more sensitive than most.” “So do you mean that your bladder gives up easily?” Daisy asked, she didn’t know how else to phrase it.

“Kind of...” Rosalina replied; “that’s the gist of it anyway – I can hold my bladder just fine, but when undue stress occurs it doesn’t p
ut up much of a fight.” The others were again puzzled, “undue stress?”

“Well, it doesn’t stand up well when I laugh too hard or when I’m scared; I’m really bad at staying dry while watching a movie. I startle fairly easily, I’ve definitely peed myself after hearing sudden noises on occasion. Sometimes I’ve even tripped or fell with a somewhat full bladder and that’s been enough. There’s the odd time, however, that I just plain can’t hold it in...”

Rosalina stopped abruptly; “everything okay, Rosie?” Peach asked her. She nodded, “mhmm...I just couldn’t hold it in,” she giggled. Rosalina was referring to a sudden splash of warmth under her skirt; she moved her skirt back to reveal her diaper. She placed her hand on the growing wetness, “even if this was unintentional, it still feels nice.”

Daisy couldn’t help but poke Rosalina’s wet crotch, “I bet you feel a lot better now, huh?” Rosalina laughed and tried to shove Daisy’s hand away, “get out of here, you perv!” “I’m not the one flashing my panties here, girl,” Daisy replied back, laughing. Peach joined in: “hey now, maybe this is just Rosalina’s way of telling us that she needs her diaper changed!” “I think you’re right, Peach,” Daisy replied. Daisy pointed to Rosalina’s crotch again “look at how wet you are, Rosalina; do you want us to change you?”

Rosalina knew that they weren’t too serious, but she played along “but guys, I can change myself! Remember that spell I put on these? You can change your diaper by just thinking about it.” “Oh, is that all?” Daisy said in a devilish tone, “didn’t I see a pack of extra diapers poking out of your bag before we left?” Rosalina stammered at Daisy’s response, “well, um – those are – for us when we go to bed! Those are the super thick ones that I told you about!”

“You sounded a little excited about those, Rosie!” Peach commented. “I’d be lying if I said that I wasn’t looking forward to wearing them later,” replied Rosalina. “Personally, I think that can wait for a little while. I mean, we’re barely into the evening.”

“Well, since we’re in here...” Peach began; “why don’t we put my home theatre to good use? I have a big collection of movies and video games we can check out.” Daisy and Rosalina warmed right up to Peach’s suggestion. “Sounds like fun!” Daisy said, she stretched in her seat “it’s been a stressful few days, that sounds like the best thing right now!”
152222222222211212211211111111111121212.title: Accidents Happen

1522222222222112122112111111111111212121.content:
Peach got up and wandered over to a nearby shelf; she began perusing through the collection of cases. “Daisy, why don’t you take a look through some of my games on that shelf?” Peach asked, her focus still on the first shelf. Daisy stood up at the sound of Peach’s request, “I suppose I can take a look.” Daisy made her way over to the shelf opposite the one Peach was near; “any preferences?” she asked the others.

“I’m not particular,” Rosalina replied; “I did say that I’m bad with comedies and horrors, but I really enjoy them.” Peach turned around and smiled, “good to know, I’m starting to narrow my search.” Daisy popped another question, “I have a strange proposition, if you two are interested.” “What did you have in mind?” Peach asked.
“Well, would you like to watch me do a playthrough of Resident Evil 4? I’ve been itching to take another shot at a professional mode run for a while.” Rosalina walked over to Daisy and looked over her shoulder at the game case; “so, we would just watch you play through this?” “Pretty much,” Daisy replied; “it sounds a bit dull but this game is really entertaining, even if you’re just watching.”

Peach smiled, “remember when we used to do that with games when we were younger? One of us would play through and the other would just sit back and enjoy the show?” Daisy turned to Peach and nodded, “that was my thought when I saw this; so, you up for it?” Peach thought about it; “well, you were always much better at shooters than I ever was.”

Daisy flashed the game case at Rosalina, “the game is pretty bloody, and some of the monsters are really freaky. Is that okay with you?” Rosalina nodded, “oh no, it’s really fine; I could never play Resident Evil games to save my life, so I’m kind of interested to see one through to the end.” A grin enveloped Daisy’s face, “sweet! I guess we found our winner!”

Peach put the cases that she was holding back on the shelf, after which she walked over to where Daisy and Rosalina stood. “You know, I got this game as a gift ages ago, but I never managed to get very far in it.” Daisy laughed a bit, “don’t worry, I’ll make sure you both get a good show!”

Rosalina and Peach made their way to the couch centred in the room as Daisy placed the game disc into the console. Peach grabbed a nearby remote and proceeded to turn on the TV; she swapped it for a second remote. “What’s the other remote for?” Rosalina questioned; Peach grinned, “it’s the sound system, this’ll be its test run!” Daisy walked back to the couch with a wireless controller in hand; “alright girls, this is only my second or third time trying professional mode, but I’ll do my best.”

The game popped up on the massive TV screen on the wall; the title screen music boomed through the various speakers throughout the room. “Man, those speakers are amazing!” Peach commented. “Hehehe, they’ll make some of those boss fights really scary,” Daisy laughed menacingly; she looked back at the other two, “get comfortable, it’s time to take down Los Illuminados!”
1522222222222112122112111111111111212121.title: The girls enjoy some entertainment

1522222222222112122112111111111111212121.content:
Several hours later...

“Things seem to get more intense every chapter,” Peach said, commenting on Daisy’s progression through the game. Peach and Rosalina continued to watch as Daisy continued to fight through the obstacles in Resident Evil 4. She was very far into the game, and was currently running through an underground tunnel with the likes of an alien-like creature; “I was not looking forward to this part,” Daisy said. “What’s so bad about this thing?” Rosalina asked, to which Daisy replied “basically, it crawls along the ceiling and pops out at random.” Daisy stopped to dart into a room and positioned herself behind a canister, “it’s nearly invulnerable, so you have to tip these canisters and freeze it before damaging it.”

On screen, the monster dropped down in front of Leon and shrieked at him; Leon tipped over the canister, causing the monster to freeze instantly. Daisy moved her character towards the exit, then turned around and began firing rounds into the frozen beast; after a few shots it thawed, and shrieked again before leaping back into the rafters. “You seem to be getting closer,” Peach said; “I think I have to freeze it once more and I’m finished,” Daisy replied. “Are you doing alright, Daisy?” Peach asked; “I’m doing alright, why?” “Well, you just seem a bit frazzled, that’s all,” Peach replied; Daisy added, “I just have...a lot of things on my mind at the moment.”

The reason behind Daisy’s frantic tone was the fact that her bladder was getting quite full; the urgency of it had been slowly building until this moment. Even though she was wearing a diaper, Daisy continued to hold it in because she didn’t want to become too relaxed and lose focus. “Okay, last canister; almost there!” Daisy exclaimed; she couldn’t wait to finish this area. There was an eerie calm emanating in the game; “it should have showed up by now...” Daisy muttered. The monster’s footsteps were fast approaching her location, another loud shriek rang through the small room, “where is it?!” Daisy said, her voice more frantic now. “ Rosalina said in a shaky voice, “I think it might be right behind you.”

Daisy commanded Leon to turn around and face the rest of the room, sure enough the monster was there, and it was about to tear Leon’s head off. Peach and Rosalina screamed at the surprising appearance of the monster; at the last second, Daisy managed to dodge the attack and roll back to the canister’s position. She frantically tried to push the canister over, but it seemed to take an eternity; the monster closed in for its next (and likely lethal) attack. “Don’t let it end here, I’ve done so well!” Daisy cried, her heart racing at the thought of losing to the beast. She closed her eyes, and time seemed to stop around her as she continued to mash on the controller. Suddenly, a voice echoed in her mind: “you got it!”

Daisy opened her eyes to see that the voice was right, she had frozen the monster; she did not hesitate to shoot it with every last round she had. The game moved to a cutscene, the monster had died at her feet and dissolved into the floor; the scene ended and guided Leon to the escape route. The chapter was over, and Daisy promptly saved. “Umm...I think I’m gonna leave off here for tonight; things got really stressful towards the end there,” Daisy said; she was very quiet, like something had taken the life right out of her. “Well, it is getting pretty late; it’s fine if you want to quit here,” Peach commented. Daisy slumped back in her seat; “yeah, that last part was a bit too much for me.”

As Daisy relaxed in her seat next to Peach and Rosalina, something dawned on her – her bladder was feeling very empty right now. She pressed her legs together and felt a distinct wetness under her clothes; the monster startled her badly enough that she wet herself as a result. Daisy didn’t say anything at first, but soon heard Rosalina’s voice; “does the couch feel a bit damp?” Daisy’s face flushed right away, as she was about to defend herself, Peach interrupted. “Umm...I think that’s my fault; I’m pretty sure my diaper overflowed a bit after my last accident.” Everyone looked down at Peach’s spot on the couch; she lifted her bottom off the couch to reveal a wet spot on the cushion, liquid droplets were leaking from Peach’s diaper and down the inside of her legs. Needless to say, Daisy was silently relieved that the wet couch cushion wasn’t her fault.

Rosalina ran a finger across Peach’s bottom; “you soaked it pretty good, Peach.” Peach’s face turned red, “well, I would be lying if I said that the game didn’t scare me at some parts.” Rosalina smiled, “it’s not your fault, Peach; accidents happen.” Rosalina stopped running her finger on the outside of the diaper, “besides, it’s not like you were the only one to get scared that badly by it.” She stood up and stretched; “why don’t we head upstairs for a bit? I think more than one of us could benefit from a change,” Rosalina said.
1522222222222112122112111111111111212121.title: Several hours later...

1522222222222112122112111111111111212121.content:
Peach jumped at Rosalina’s suggestion, “can I have one of those super-thick diapers that Daisy mentioned earlier?!” Everyone paused, and then laughed at Peach’s overeager response. Rosalina calmed down and nodded, “of course, Peach; I had the same plan for myself, to be honest.” Rosalina then walked over to Daisy, “how about you?” she playfully patted the front of Daisy’s shorts, “do you want to have something a little more comfy for bed?” Daisy retuned a smile to Rosalina; “that does sound pretty nice, actually.”

After turning off the TV and getting the lights, the girls climbed the stairs to Peach’s bedroom. As they drew closer to the room, Peach casually turned to Daisy; “so Daisy, why exactly were you acting so odd before?” Daisy was slow to respond; “well, it’s a bit silly, but I didn’t want to break my concentration during the game, and I had to pee really badly towards the end...and...” “And?” Peach queried. Daisy finished her story; “and I may have been spooked pretty badly by that monster during the last canister part, and one thing led to another.”

Peach giggled, “so you can get scared; to think that the big tomboy was frightened so bad that she had a little accident!” Daisy’s face flushed again, “says the girl who made a puddle on the couch, despite all that extra padding.” The two looked at each other, Daisy definitely had the upper hand in the argument; Peach responded with a smirk and a shrug, “good point.” Daisy put her hands behind her head and looked upwards, “I’m still a bit embarrassed, but in a good way.” “Really? How so?” Peach wondered. Daisy replied, “well, it’s like Rosalina said earlier – there’s something really nice about...being back in diapers.”

Not before long, the girls arrived at Peach’s bedroom. Rosalina entered the room first and quickly made her way to the bed where her suitcase was resting. Peach and Daisy followed suit; Peach wandered over to Rosalina and anxiously waited to see the extra-thick diapers she would be changed into. During this time, Daisy found her suitcase and began looking for something; she soon pulled out a long shirt, a jersey of some kind. “What’s that for?” Peach asked, “I just wanted something else to wear to bed, frankly I don’t think my shorts will fit over a diaper as thick as Rosalina specified.” Peach nodded and returned her focus to Rosalina’s search; Daisy quietly began to change into her night shirt.

Rosalina pulled out a large package from her suitcase, “here they are!” she said. Peach looked pretty excited, this excitement increased as Rosalina opened the package and pulled out the first diaper. Daisy tossed her old clothes back in the suitcase and pushed it under the bed; her jersey covered everything down to her thighs, the bottom was loose enough as to not show the diaper’s bulk. Peach caught a glimpse of Daisy’s sleepwear; “it’s almost like a miniskirt, not what I was expecting from you, Daisy.” Daisy shrugged, “I wear this to bed most nights, but the length feels much shorter than when I just have panties on underneath.”

Daisy pulled down the jersey a bit, there wasn’t much excess length between the end of her ‘skirt’ and the bulge of her diaper; “I can’t imagine how much is going to show with something twice as thick as this.” Rosalina had laid out a few diapers for the three of them, “well then, who’s going to be first?” Peach and Daisy looked at each other, but the answer was pretty simple.
1522222222222112122112111111111111212121.title: The girls head upstairs

1522222222222112122112111111111111212121.content:
"I think it's pretty obvious that the one who's bursting at the seams should go first," Daisy answered. She was referring to Peach's still leaking diaper, it looked like it was well past critical mass. Peach nodded, "fine by me, I'm starting to get worried that there's going to be a puddle under my feet anytime now." Rosalina sat down on the bed and patted the spot next to her, "okay then," she said; "just take off that wet skirt and lay down next to me here." Peach unzipped her skirt and pushed it down past her soaking wet diaper, it fell to her feet and she stepped out of it. She sat down next to Rosalina and laid her head back on the soft bed.

Rosalina gently undid the tapes on either side and pulled the diaper off of Peach; "just lift up for a second," she said as she began to slide the fresh diaper under Peach's bottom. As soon as it started, it seemed to end as Rosalina tightly secured the new diaper around Peach's waist, "all done," she said. Peach sat up next to Rosalina, she shifted her body around to feel the new diaper; "how does it feel?" Rosalina asked. "I don't think I can close my legs," Peach said; Daisy laughed. "That's normal," Rosalina chuckled; "why don't you try walking around a bit?"

Peach nodded and rose from the bed, she began to walk a few steps; the increased spacing between her legs made it difficult to manage more than a waddle. She turned around to face Daisy and Rosalina, "it's really hard to walk in, but I like it. It's so comfortable!" Rosalina smiled, "I figured you would enjoy it." She then turned to Daisy; Rosalina smiled and said "your turn." Daisy crawled onto the bed and laid down next to Rosalina; she closed her eyes, "it's okay if you're embarrassed - this won't take long," Rosalina said.

Daisy opened her eyes a moment later to see a much thicker diaper staring back at her. Daisy pressed her hands into the soft material, she smiled when she felt it against her body. "I take it your smile means that it's satisfactory?" Rosalina whispered into her ear, Daisy looked at her and smiled warmly, "the best!" Daisy stood up next to Peach, and she adjusted her jersey to fit her new diaper; it was a snug fit around her body. "Uh oh, looks like you got a bit peeking out in the back here!" Rosalina commented.

Peach giggled at Rosalina's observation, Daisy turned around to view the situation for herself. Her new diaper peeked out from the back of her jersey, despite being covered up in the front; "shouldn't surprise me, I guess," she commented. "Well, now that both of you are done, who wants to help me change into one of these?" Rosalina asked to the others. Peach and Daisy were faced with yet another decision, after a brief moment they had decided on...
1522222222222112122112111111111111212121.title: Peach goes first

choices: They stay up a little longer
1522222222222112122112111111111111212121.content:
"I'll do it," Daisy replied; she turned around and walked to the nearby bed, "might as well return the favor, right?" Daisy grabbed one more diaper for Rosalina, who preceded to lay back on the mattress. Rosalina unzipped her skirt and lowered it enough so that she could let it fall to the floor. Peach crawled onto the bed and sat next to Rosalina, she ran a hand along Rosalina's diaper, "geez, you're just as wet as I was!" "Well, I didn't exactly have a chance to change it today," Rosalina said; she raised a hand to her head and rustled it through her blonde hair - she wasn't exactly proud of herself. "No matter; here, let me change you into this," Daisy replied, but before she began taking off Rosalina's diaper she was stopped.

Rosalina put a hand in front of her diaper, "do you mind waiting for a bit?" Daisy and Peach were a bit confused at first, but Daisy quickly noticed a look of 'urgency' in Rosalina's eyes - she knew exactly what the issue was. "Alright, go ahead," Daisy said warmly. Rosalina's thanks was followed by a loud hissing noise, she had both hands on her diaper now, trying to prevent any leakage. After a moment, the hissing subsided; Rosalina sighed in relief. "Sorry about that, it kinda snuck up on me at the last second," she said. Peach comforted Rosalina, "it's okay, happens to all of us...right?" she looked over to Daisy and smiled; Daisy blushed and laughed, "true."

Once Rosalina was finished, Daisy began the process of changing her. After what seemed like an instant passed, the job was done. Rosalina sat up, the loud crinkle of the excessively thick diaper made her blush. "I did a good job, I assume?" Daisy asked, to which Rosalina answered "yes, thank you; now I can put my pajamas on." Peach giggled, "they're not the ones I think they are, are they? From when you were sick?" Rosalina reached over the side of the bed and flipped through her bag, she returned shortly with the answer to Peach's question. "The very same," she said, referring to the fuzzy, footed pajamas. "I couldn't help myself, they are really comfy!" Rosalina commented.

Rosalina stepped into the blue pajamas as the others sat close to her. Once her feet were in, Rosalina pulled it up over her legs and up to her waist, "this is the tricky part," she said. "That's to be expected when you have an extra three or four inches of padding around there," Peach said cheerfully; "it looks snug, but the material stretches around it comfortably," Rosalina stated. After getting over the extra bulk, Rosalina was able to place her arms through the sleeves and pull the zipper up to her neck. Once snugly in her pajamas, Rosalina rested her hands just behind herself and leaned back, "mmm, I've been waiting all day to put these on."

Peach's face lit up in excitement, "Rosalina, you look so adorable! You remind me of myself when I was little!" Rosalina smiled, "thanks, Peach! I especially love how it feels against my skin, even over my diaper!" Daisy interrupted the conversation with a closer inspection of Rosalina's nightwear, "wow, this thing really fits your figure well." The pajamas were indeed very form-fitting, particularly their inability to compress the bulge of Rosalina's diaper. "By the way, did you make these yourself?" Daisy asked; "Well, yes, why do you ask?" Rosalina answered.

Daisy continued, "well, I noticed that there's no opening in the back, that's all." Rosalina appeared confused, "opening? what do you mean?" Daisy explained, "well, on these types of pajamas, there is usually an opening right about here (she patted around Rosalina's butt) for...when you need to go." Rosalina still seemed puzzled, "that makes sense, but I don't see the point to it - aren't I just going in my diaper, anyway?" Daisy sighed, "okay, this is a bad example; forget I mentioned it." "Well, Rosalina, people don't always wear a diaper under these pajamas, that's all - hence the opening," Peach explained to her.

Rosalina buried her hands between her legs and said innocently, "where's the fun in that? wearing a thick diaper under my jammies feels wonderful!" She sighed, "if only more felt the same way." Peach and Daisy fell into a fit of laughter, "that's so cute!" Peach staggered amidst her laughter. The feeling was infectious, Rosalina began laughing as well. The laughter continued for a good while, "stop, you're going to make me pee myself again!" Rosalina pleaded. "Somehow, I don't think you would be too upset over that," Daisy commented; Rosalina giggled more. Eventually, the three girls calmed down and wondered what they would do next...
1522222222222112122112111111111111212121.title: Daisy will change her

choices: The princesses pretended to like Bowser
1522222222222112122112111111111111212122.content:
Peach, Daisy, and Rosalina were all huddled together asleep on the couch, a blanket covering all three of them.

Suddenly knocking was heard from the door, causing all three of them to wake up.

"I'll get it...." Daisy groaned, rubbing the sleep from her eyes and getting up to answer the door.

When she opened it she found none other than...

"Bowser!" All three girls gasped at once.

"Gwahaha, that's right!" Bowser smirked. "I'm here to kidnap one sexy girl, and what do you know- I found three!"

Peach's face reddened as she realized she was only wearing a shirt and a diaper, and her heart raced as she thought of what to do.

"Get out of here you perverted bastard!" Daisy cried, trying to push Bowser out the door.

Bowser stumbled a bit, then pushed Daisy out of the way and she fell to the floor. Bowser barged his way in and made his way over to the couch, and ripped the blanket off Rosalina and Peach.

Peach gasped, and placed her arms over her exposed diaper.

"Ha! A diaper?" Bowser laughed and slapped his knee. "Peach, I know you're a baby sometimes but this is just too much!"

Peach's expression got teary from her embarrassment, and Rosalina defensively stood in front of her while raising her wand.

"You dumbass loser, how dare you! Just get lost!" Rosalina fired a spell at him, which failed.

"Pathetic, women belong in the kitchen. Don't bother fighting." Bowser grabbed Peach and Rosalina at once.

"Take this!"

Daisy charged at Bowser, but he lifted a foot and kicked her away. When she landed, he picked her up with the same one Peach was held in and went out the door. He'd successfully kidnapped all three princesses.

Peach, Daisy, and Rosalina found themselves in a dungeon. It was like a normal room, but the door had prison bars. Three beds, three dressers, and a kitchen and bathroom were also featured in the dungeon.

"We're screwed... Mario doesnt even know we're here, how will he save us?" Peach wiped a tear after she spoke.

Rosalina comforted her friend with a hug, and Daisy joined in too.

A squishing sound was heard as they hugged.

"Sorry, that was me." Peach admitted while pointing to her diaper.

"Mine isn't dry either." Rosalina added.

"Or mine." Daisy said.

"Awww man, there's a bathroom but what fun is that?" Peach whined.

"Oooh, someone's being naughty." Daisy teased. "Silly girl, getting too lazy to use the potty. You deserve to be tickled!"

Daisy kept at Peach, and the two giggled and tickled each other.

"You two are funny." Rosalina giggled, but sounded slightly bored as she watched.

Daisy noticed she was sitting uncomfortably on the floor.

"Rosie, you're bladder really let loose!" Daisy commented.

Rosalina blushed. "N-no it didn't. Not more than yours have."

"Let me see!" Peach tackled Rosalina and felt her diaper. "Wow, it's beyond soaked!"

"Wow, you're right." Daisy felt it too. "If Peach deserved to be tickled, then you deserve to be spanked!"

Daisy pulled Rosalina over her knee and playfully spanked her. Rosalina giggled and squirmed. "Get off me!"

"You've been a bad girl!" Daisy continued.

Bowser's voice was suddenly heard. "This is beyond hot, keep going."

All three princesses looked at Bowser in disgust.

"Whatever." Bowser growled. "You'll be use to me soon, and then you'll be begging for a peice of me!"

"Never! I want Mario!" Peach whined.

"Yeah, we'll never be attracted to a turtle!" Daisy spat.

"Yeah right, you all love me deep down inside." Bowser sat himself between them all and placed a hand between Peach's and Rosalina's shoulders.
1522222222222112122112111111111111212122.title: Several hours later...

15222222222221121221121111111111112122.content:
The laughter died down, “such an odd thing to be joking about, when you think about it” Daisy commented. “Ya, but this is just the kind of weekend we’re in store for,” Peach replied. “Oh, there’s just one more thing, Peach” Rosalina interjected. “What’s that?” Peach wondered; Rosalina leaned in and spoke in a soft tone “you’re going to wet the bed...heavily...just a heads up.” Daisy heard the gist of Rosalina’s information, she started laughing again.

Peach giggled, “frankly, I would be surprised if I didn’t wet in my sleep during this whole experiment,” Rosalina laughed. Rosalina pulled her bean bag chair in right in between Peach and Daisy, and she nestled herself in its plush. “Well, Peach; one thing I liked to do at night was use a spell to make my diaper really thick – as thick as I made it when I was sick a few weeks ago,” Rosalina described to Peach. Both Peach and Daisy liked Rosalina’s solution, “that sounds really comfy!” they said in unison. “It is probably one of my favourite parts about wearing a diaper,” Rosalina added; “I still do it every night!”

“Aw, that just sounds adorable!” Peach said in a cutesy tone; “can we all do that tonight?” she asked – pleaded, actually. Rosalina giggled, “of course! it’s an easy spell, so I can show you both for when you want to do it on your own, too.” Daisy was intrigued by Rosalina’s offer, “so...how thick are we talking here?” she asked. “Um...I usually make my diaper about three inches thick, sometimes more,” Rosalina responded; Daisy was amazed, “sleeping in that must feel so nice!” Rosalina had a look of satisfaction in her eyes, “you don’t know the half of it, Daisy.”

Rosalina continued to describe her comfort: “That’s why I love being diapered; you experience things that you never get a chance to. Imagine lying in bed, and as you sink into the mattress you have this extra cushion pressing against your body. It crinkles loudly, and it feels like a big pillow. Sometimes, I like to wear my night diaper on during the day. My dress doesn’t fit too well over one that thick, so I just wear my feety pajamas or a t-shirt over them and just...waddle around in it.”

“So your favourite thing to do is make your diaper so thick that you have trouble walking properly?” Peach asked. Rosalina nodded, “mhmm...well, there’s one other part I love; it’s strange, but I think I enjoy wetting myself a little too much.” Peach laughed hysterically, “that’s so naughty! I think we need to show you how to take your diaper off once in a while, Rosie!” Rosalina’s face was turning redder, “I would more often, but they’re so comfy that I just don’t want to take them off, even to pee!” she said. Daisy interjected with a question to Rosalina; “let’s rephrase that question: when was the last time you used a toilet to go pee?”

Rosalina took a surprisingly long time to think about Daisy’s question, to which she finally replied “uh...does sitting on the toilet and going in my diaper count?” Daisy shook her head, “have you really gone that long without using the toilet?” “Well, yeah; it’s pretty easy to stay in diapers and not even consider something like that,” Rosalina replied. “It was the same for me when I was a kid,” Peach commented; “it’s not a bad thing, if you like doing it then just do it.” Daisy asked another question: “so, Rosalina; by diapering yourself indefinitely, doesn’t your bladder control suffer?”

Rosalina shook her head, “not really, no; I make sure that my bladder doesn’t get lazy. I just act as though I’m going to the bathroom like I normally would, but I replace the toilet with my diaper.” “Do you have to do anything special?” Peach asked. “No, just make sure that you’re not peeing frequently just for the sake of it; hold it in like you normally would. As I mentioned before, what I found helped me was simply sitting on the toilet and wetting myself; it keeps your body attentive, and you get used to the diaper at the same time.”

Rosalina paused for a second “...that being said...I wasn’t exactly ‘perfect’ before I started wearing them.” Peach and Daisy looked puzzled; “what do you mean?” Rosalina replied, “let’s just say that I’m (she blushes)...accident prone?”
15222222222221121221121111111111112122.title: The girls discuss what they like about being di...

choices: Diapers so thick they can't stand up!
Diapers so thick they waddle like a duck!
152222222222211212211211111111111121221.content: Suddenly, Rosalina started wetting herself! "you mean like right now?" Daisy asked. "Wha... Oh, I guess you're right!" They all started giggling, after which they broke into downright laughter. When she had calmed down enough to speak, Peach asked, "So do they only have to be that thick?" "What do you mean?" Rosalina asked. "I mean, can we make them thicker?" "Oh, sure. It would just take a little bit of tinkering with the spell." "Sounds good!" Daisy cried. "Al right then, How thick do you want, Peach?" Rosalina asked.
152222222222211212211211111111111121221.title: Accidents happen

choices: Peach asks for both spells to be cast on daisy
Peach asks for Rosalina to cast the messing spell on her
152222222222211212211211111111111121222.content:
"Go on" Daisy prodded leaning forward with Peach attempting to goad some answers out of Rosalina.
"Oh fine, I wasn't all that interested in going to the bathroom when i needed too, the need always popped up during one of my experiments, or during a movie, or when i just tried resting in bed a little bit longer, and i was so desperate to stay put and finish that i would end up ruining my dresses" Rosalina huffed as she crossed her arms "It was so annoying that i decided i was going to wear diapers and that i was going to find a way disable my body's ability to hold waste, so i wouldn't have to deal with it anymore" Rosalina finished.
"Wait so you wanted to loose control, but i thought you...?" Daisy interrupted with a confused question.
"Don't interrupt or I'll make you mess yourself" Rosalia warned before going back to her story "Fortunately i was already working on some spells to use on one's enemies so i decided to retool it, so i could cast it on myself, but halfway throught my research i caught that bug and grew disinterested with messing myself, but by that time i had already gotten a good grasp on using a spell to make myself and others mess so i went on" Rosalina waved offhandedly, taking a sip of water and continuing "As i went on and mastered the spell and its use an went on to use it on myself i realized i rather missed my control and would rather dictate when and where i wet myself" Rosalina said.
"Wait so you can make other people wet themselves helplessly and mess them selves?" Peach asked leaning so far forward her padded butt threatened to slip and fall forward.
"Yes why?" Rosalina asked.
"Do you think you could..."
152222222222211212211211111111111121222.title: Rosalina's accidents

choices: "Hey Daisy, do you want to have Rosalina baby us?"
"Let's get back at Bowser for kidnapping us!"
152222222222211212211211111112.content: Peach came back in carrying a platter. "I've got cookies!" "Yay!" they all exclaim. While they eat the cookies, Peach asks, "I know this is kinda out of the blue, but Rosalina, can you turn people into babies?" "Sure, Peach, how come?" "well...
152222222222211212211211111112.title: Peach re-enters the bedroom

1522222222222112122112111111121.content: "Hmm..." Daisy thought for a moment, "well, Peach, I guess..."
1522222222222112122112111111121.title: Options

1522222222222112122112111112.content:
Daisy had no desire to be diapered, so she took a step backwards away from her friends. Then she turned around and ran for the door.

But Rosalina was too fast for her; she raised her wand and then closed and locked the door with her magic. Daisy reached the door and tried frantically to open it.

Peach then ran - or rather, waddled quickly - over to Daisy and pounced on her. She forced her onto the ground, making her lie flat on her stomach.

"Don't try struggling, Daisy," Peach told her friend as she held her arms behind her back. "These diapers are extremely soft and comfortable!"

1522222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Princess Peach was taking a walk around her castle's courtyard. Between constantly getting captured and participating in go-kart races and golf tournaments, she rarely had any time to herself, so she made sure to savor every moment. As she took in the beautiful sunlight, she suddenly saw something strange on the ground. It looked like one of the many mushrooms that grew in the Kingdom, except it appeared to have chubby cheeks, sleepy looking eyes, a yellow cap with brown spots, and it gave off a strange odor.

"Wow, I've never seen this kind of mushroom before." Peach said. "Maybe I should tell someone..."

She was about to get up and do so, but for some reason the mushroom's odor seemed to be calling her back. It was not a terrible smell, but there seemed to be something very addicting about it. She leaned down closer to the mushroom and then picked it up, taking in a big whiff of it.

1522222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Mario's body

1522222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Yet another typical day in the Mushroom Kingdom: Bowser has kidnapped Peach, and is taking her to his castle in a Koopa Klown Kar. Instead of being frightened, Peach is bored out of her mushroom skull. "Are we there yet?" she asks.

"No," Bowser says.

"Are we there yet?"

"No!"

"Are we there yet?"

"No!"

"Are we there yet?"

"No!"

"Are we there yet?"

"If you don't shut your warp pipe hole, I'm going to turn this vehicle around!"

"Yeah, that would teach me."

"Indeed, now let's g- wait a minute! Nice try, Toadstool."

"Well, it was worth a shot."

"Oh, relax, Peach. When I finally defeat Mario, you and I will be together forever."

Peach just scoffs. "Even if you turn into a Fire Emblem character, I still won't be attracted to you."

"We'll see..."

***

Bowser eventually makes it to his castle. "Well, here we are, my lady," he says.

"Yaaaay," Peach mutters with flat joy. "Now just show me to your prison that is specially made for me. You know, with all the soft, princessy items and a cavalcade of video games to play to pass the time until Mario knocks your hard-shelled butt into the lava yet again."

"Oh, I have something else planned," Bowser says.

"Oh. So you're going to place me in a typical prison? How rude!"

"No Peach, you're not going into a prison this time."

"What do you mean?"

"Follow me."

Peach reluctantly follows the Koopa King into a science lab and notices a pair of operating tables. "Been playing Trauma Center, huh?"

"Yep."

"So how many lives have you lost in that game?"

"Um, 1 or 2?"

"Actually, 85," one of Bowser's Goombas, popping out, says.

"Shut up!" Bowser says as he jumps onto the Goomba, thus squishing him flat. "Now go be an obstacle for Mario!"

The Goomba grumbles to himself as he leaves the castle. "You know, being jumped on by Mario doesn't seem too bad, anymore."

Ignoring that scene, Peach says, "So what is with the tables?"

"Oh, you'll see," Bowser says as he pulls out a potion. "Drink this."
